T06asmahsbu:6: arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute vācā padaiś cāmalair duḥkhasyottaraṇāya duḥkhitajane kāruṇyatas tanmayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:7: dharmasyottamayānadeśitavidheḥ satveṣu tadgāmiṣu śliṣṭām arthagatiṃ niruttaragataṃ pañcātmikāṃ darśayan // AMsa_1.1 //
T06asmahsbu:8: arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute iti ka upadeśam ārabhya ko 'laṃkarotīti /
T06asmahsbu:13: amalayā vāceti pauruṣayā amalaiḥ padair yuktaiḥ sahitair iti vistaraḥ /
T06asmahsbu:14: na hi vinā vācā padavyañjanair artho vibhāvayituṃ sakyata iti /
T06asmahsbu:20: uttamayānasya deśito vidhir yasmin dharme tasya dharmasya /
T06asmahsbu:27: (Msa 2) śliṣṭam iti yuktāṃ niruttaragatām ity anuttarajñānagatāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:28: tām idānīṃ pañcātmikāṃ arthagatiṃ dvitīyena ślokena darśyati /
T06asmahsbu:29: ghaṭitam iva suvarṇaṃ vārijaṃ vā vibuddhaṃ sukṛtam iva subhojyaṃ bhujyamānaṃ kṣudhārtaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:30: vidita iva sulekho ratnapeṭeva muktā vivṛta iha sa dharmaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti // AMsa_1.2 //
T06asmahsbu:31: anena ślokena pañcabhir dṛṣṭāntaiḥ sa hi dharmaḥ pañcavidham artham adhikṛtya deśitaḥ
T06asmahsbu:32: sādhyaṃ vyutpādyaṃ cintyam acintyaṃ pariniṣpannaṃ cādhigamārthaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ
T06asmahsbu:34: so 'nena sūtrālaṃkāreṇa vivṛtaḥ prītim agrāṃ dadhādati /
T06asmahsbu:36: yadā sa dharmaḥ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ so 'laṃkriyata ity asya codyasya parihārārthaṃ trtīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:37: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darpaṇagataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayati nṛṇāṃ darśanavaśāt /
T06asmahsbu:38: tathā dharmaḥ soktaprakṛtiguṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthas tuṣṭiṃ janayati viśiṣṭām iha satām // AMsa_1.3 //
T06asmahsbu:40: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darśaṇagataṃ darśanavaśād viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayaty
T06asmahsbu:41: evaṃ sa dharmaḥ subhāṣitaiḥ prajkṛtyaiva guṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthas tuṣṭiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ janayati /
T06asmahsbu:42: buddhimatām atas tuṣṭiviśeṣotpādanād alaṃkṛta iva bhavatīti /
T06asmahsbu:43: ataḥ paraṃ tribhiḥ ślokais tasmin dharme trividham upaśaṃsaṃ darśayaty ādarotpādanārthaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:45: dharmarmo dvayavyavasthāstho vyañjanato 'rtho na ca jñeyaḥ // AMsa_1.4 //
T06asmahsbu:49: dharmas tathāyam abudhaṃ viparyayāt toṣayati tadvat // AMsa_1.6 //
T06asmahsbu:57: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kutas tasyāyam anuśaṃso bhaviṣyatīty atra vipratipannas tasya buddhavacanatvaprasādhanārthaṃ kāraṇavibhājyam ārabhya ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:60: ādāv avyākaraṇāt yady etat saddharmāntarāye paścāt kenāpi utpāditaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:61: kasmād ādau bhavatā na vyākṛtam anāgatabhayavat /
T06asmahsbu:62: samapravṛtteḥ samakālaṃ ca śrāvakayānena mahāyānasya pravṛtter upalabhyate na paścād iti katham asyābuddhavacanatvaṃ vijñāyate /
T06asmahsbu:63: agocarān nāyam evam udāro gambhīraś ca dharmas tārkikāṇāṃ gocaraḥ /
T06asmahsbu:69: sa eva buddho yo 'bhisaṃbudhya evam bhāṣate /
T06asmahsbu:70: bhāvābhāve 'bhāvād yadi mahāyānaṃ kiṃcid asti tasya bhāva siddhim idaṃ buddhavacanam ato 'nyasya mahāyānasyābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:72: śrāvakayānaṃ budhavacanaṃ na mahāyānam iti na yujyate vinā buddhayānena buddhānām anutpādāt /
T06asmahsbu:73: pratipakṣatvād bhāvyamānaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ sarvanirvikalpajñānāśrayatvena kleśānāṃ pratipakṣo bhavati tasmād buddhavacanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:74: rutānyatvāt na cāsya yathārutam arthas tasmān na yathārutārthānusāreṇedam abuddhavacanaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:75: yad uktam ādāv avyākaraṇād ity anābhogād etad anāgataṃ bhagavatā na vyākṛtam iti kasyacit syād ata upekṣāyā ayoge ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:77: adhvany anyanāvṛtajñānā upekṣāto na yujyate // AMsa_1.8 //
T06asmahsbu:80: tribhiḥ kāraṇair anāgatasya mahataḥ śāsanopadravasyopkeṣā na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:81: buddhānām ayatnato jñānapravṛtteḥ pratyakṣacakṣuṣkatayā śāsanarakṣayāś ca yatnavatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:84: etad eva śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānam etenaiva mahābodhiprāptir iti kasyacit syād ataḥ śrāvakayānasya mahāyānatvāyoge ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:86: na śrāvakayānam idaṃ bhavati mahāyānadharmākhyam // AMsa_1.9 //
T06asmahsbu:87: vaikalyāt parārthopadeśasya na hi śrāvakayāne kaścit parārtha upadiṣṭaḥ śrāvakāṇām ātmano nirvidvirāgavimuktimātropāyopadeśāt /
T06asmahsbu:88: na ca svārtha eva pareṣūpadiśyamānaḥ parārtho bhavitum arhati /
T06asmahsbu:89: virodhāt svārthe hi paro niyujyamānaḥ svārtha eva prayujyate sa ātmana eva parinirvāṇārthaprayukto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyata iti virodham etat /
T06asmahsbu:90: na ca śrāvakayānenaiva cirakālaṃ bodhau ghaṭamāno buddho bhavitum arhati /
T06asmahsbu:92: anupāyo hi śrāvakayānaṃ buddhatvasya na cānupāyena ciram api prayujyamānaḥ prārthitam arthaṃ prāpnoti /
T06asmahsbu:95: tathāpy anupadeśān na śrāvakayānam eva mahāyānaṃ bhavitum arhati /
T06asmahsbu:96: na hi sa tādṛśa upadeśa etasminn upalabhyate /
T06asmahsbu:97: viruddham vā cānyonyaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ cety anyonyavirodhe ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:99: upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnam eva tat // AMsa_1.10 //
T06asmahsbu:103: śrāvakayāne hy ātmaparinirvāṇāyaivāśayas tadartham evaupadeśas tadartham eva prayogaḥ
T06asmahsbu:104: parīttaś ca puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃgṛhīta upastambhaḥ kālena cālpena tadarthaprāptir
T06asmahsbu:107: tasmād anyonyavirodhād yad yānaṃ hīnaṃ hīnam eva tat /
T06asmahsbu:109: buddhavacanasyedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yat sūtre 'vatarati vinaye saṃdṛśyate dharmatāṃ ca na vilomayati /
T06asmahsbu:112: tasmān na buddhavacanam iti kasyacit syād ato lakṣaṇavirodhe ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:114: audāryād api gāmbhīryād aviruddhaiva dharmatā // AMsa_1.11 //
T06asmahsbu:116: avataraty evedaṃ svasmin mahāyānasūtre svasya ca śleśasya vinayaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
T06asmahsbu:120: na dharmatāṃ vilomayaty athaiva hi dharmatā mahābodhiprāpataye tasmān nāsti lakṣaṇavirodhaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:121: agocarād ity uktam atas tarkagocaratvāyoge ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:123: bālāśrayo matas tarkas tasyāto viṣayo na tat // AMsa_1.12 //
T06asmahsbu:124: adṛṣṭasatyāśreyo hi tarkaḥ kaścid āgamaniśrito bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:129: mahāyānas tu na niśritaṃ yāvat akhedavat /
T06asmahsbu:132: anupāyatvāt śrāvakayāne na buddhatvaṃ prāptam ity uktam atha mahāyānaṃ katham upāyo yukta ity upāyatvayoge ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:134: deśanā'to dvayasyāsmin sa copāyo niruttare // AMsa_1.13 //
T06asmahsbu:136: prabhāv audāryadeśanayā satvānāṃ paripāko prabhāv adhimuktito ghaṭanāt /
T06asmahsbu:137: gāmbhīryadeśanayā avikalpanā ata etasya dvayasyāsmin mahāyāne deśanā sa copāyo niruttare jñāne tābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ (Msa 6)
T06asmahsbu:138: satvānāṃ paripācanād ātmanaś ca buddhadharmaparipākād iti /
T06asmahsbu:139: ye punar asmāt trasanti tadartham asthānatrāsādīnave kāraṇatvena ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:140: tadasthānatrāso bhavati jagatāṃ dāhakaraṇo mahāpuṇyaskandhaprasavakaraṇād dīrghasamayam /
T06asmahsbu:141: agotro 'sanmitro 'kṛtamatir apūrvācitaśubhas trasaty asmin dharme patati mahato 'rthād gata iha // AMsa_1.14 //
T06asmahsbu:147: yena ca kāraṇena yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tat saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:148: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇe tu satīti caturvidhaṃ trāsakāraṇaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:149: gotraṃ cāsya na bhavati sanmitraṃ vā avyutpannamatir vā bhavati mahāyānadharmatāyāṃ pūrvaṃ vānupacitaśubho bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:152: trāsakāraṇam uktam atrāsakāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ity atrāsakāraṇatve ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:153: tadanyānyānyābhāvāt paramagahanatvād anugamāt vicitrasyākhyānād dhruvakathanayogād bahumukhāt /
T06asmahsbu:154: yathākhyānaṃ nārthād bhagavati ca bhāvātigahanāt na dharme 'smiṃs trāso bhavati viduṣāṃ yonivicayāt // AMsa_1.15 //
T06asmahsbu:156: atha śrāvakayānam eva mahānaṃ syād anyasya śrāvakasya pratyekabuddhasya vābhāvaḥ syāt /
T06asmahsbu:161: vicitraś cātra saṃbhāramārga ākhyāyate na kevalaṃ śūnyataiva /
T06asmahsbu:163: dhruvakathanayogād bahumukhād abhīkṣṇaṃ cātra śūnyatā kathyate bahibhiś ca paryāyais teṣu teṣu sutrānteṣu tasmād bhavitavyam atra mahatā prayogena
T06asmahsbu:164: anyathā hi sakṛt pratiṣedhamātrakṛtam abhaviṣyad iti /
T06asmahsbu:165: yathākhyānaṃ nārthāt na cāsya yathārutam artho 'smād api trāso na yuktaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:166: bhagavati ca bhāvātigahanād atigahanaś ca buddhānāṃ bhāvo durājñeyas tasmān nāsmabhis tadajñānāt trasitavyam iti /
T06asmahsbu:167: (Msa 7) evaṃ yoniśaḥ pravicayād viduṣāṃ trāso na bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:169: śrutaṃ niśrityādau prabhavati manaskāra iha yo
T06asmahsbu:171: tato dharmaprāptiḥ prabhavati ca tasmin matirato
T06asmahsbu:172: yadā pratyātmaṃ sā katham asati tasmin vyavasitiḥ // AMsa_1.16 //
T06asmahsbu:173: śrutaṃ niśrityādau manaskāraḥ prabhavati yo yoniśa ity arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:174: yoniśo manasikārāt tatvārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prabhavati lokottarā samyagdṛṣṭis tatas tat phalasya dharmasya prāptis tatas tasmin prāpte matir vimuktijñānaṃ prādurbhavati /
T06asmahsbu:175: evaṃ yadā pratyātmaṃ sā matir bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:176: katham asati tasminn eṣā vyavasitir niścayo bhavati naivedaṃ buddhavacanam iti /
T06asmahsbu:178: ahaṃ na boddhā na gabhīraboddhā buddho gabhīraṃ kim atarkagamyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:179: kasmād gabhīrārthavidāṃ na mokṣa ity etad uttrāsapadaṃ na yuktam // AMsa_1.17 //
T06asmahsbu:180: yadi tāvad aham asya na boddhety uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:181: atha buddho 'pi gambhīrasya padārthasya na boddhā sa kiṃ gabhīraṃ deśayiṣyatīty uttrāsapadaṃ tad ayuktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:182: atha gambhīraṃ kasmād atarkagamyaṃ ity uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:183: atha kasmād gabhīrārthavidām evam mokṣo na tārkikāṇām ity uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:186: audāryagāmbhīryasudeśite 'smin dharme 'dhimuktir yadi nāsti siddham // AMsa_1.18 //
T06asmahsbu:187: yasya hīnā cādhimuktis tataś ca hīna eva dhātuḥ samudāgata ālayavijñānabhāvanā /
T06asmahsbu:188: hīnair eva sahāyaiḥ samānādhimuktidhātukair yaḥ parivāritas tasyāsminn audāryagāmbhīryasudeśite mahāyānadharme yady adhimuktir nāsti ata eva siddham utkṛṣṭam idaṃ mahāyānam iti /
T06asmahsbu:190: śrutānusāreṇa hi buddhimattāṃ labdhvā śrute yaḥ prakaroty avajñāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:191: śrute vicitre sati cāprameye śiṣṭe kuto niścayam eti mūḍhaḥ // AMsa_1.19 //
T06asmahsbu:192: kāmaṃ tāvad adhimuktir na syād aśrutānāṃ tu sūtrāntānām aviśeṣeṇa pratipakṣo na yuktiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:193: (Msa 8) śrutānusāreṇaiva hi buddhimattvaṃ labdhvā yaḥ śruta evāvajñāṃ karoti mūḍhaḥ sa saty evāvaśiṣṭe śrute vicitre cāprameye ca kutaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:194: kāraṇān niścayam eti na tad buddhavacanam iti /
T06asmahsbu:195: na hi tasya śrutād anyad balam asti tasmād aśrutvā pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:196: yad api ca śrutaṃ tad yoniśo manasi kartavyaṃ nāyoniśa ity ayoniśomanasikārādhīnave ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:197: yathārute 'rthe parikalpyamāne svapratyayo hānim upaiti buddheḥ /
T06asmahsbu:198: svākhyātatāṃ ca kṣipati kṣatiṃ ca prāpnoti dharme pratighāvatīva // AMsa_1.20 //
T06asmahsbu:199: svapratyaya iti svayaṃdṛṣṭapraāmarṣako na vijñānām antikād arthaparyeṣṭī /
T06asmahsbu:200: hānim upaiti buddher iti yathābhūtajñānād aprāptiparihānitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:201: dharmasya ca svākhyātatāṃ pratikṣipati tan nidānaṃ cāpuṇyaprabhāvāt kṣatiṃ prāpnoti /
T06asmahsbu:202: dharme ca pratighātam āvaraṇaṃ ca dharmavyavasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmety ayam atrādīnavaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:203: ayathāvataś cārtham avijānato 'pi pratighāto na yukta iti pratighātāyoge ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:204: manaḥ pradoṣaḥ prakṛtipraduṣṭo 'yathārute cāpi hy ayuktarūpaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:205: prāg eva saṃdehagatasya dharme tasmād upekṣaiva varaṃ hy adoṣā // AMsa_1.21 //
T06asmahsbu:215: ratnāni yo hi śaraṇapragato 'tra yāne jñeyaḥ sa eva paramaḥ śaraṇaṇagatānām /
T06asmahsbu:217: sa eva paramaḥ śaraṇaṃ gatānām iti /
T06asmahsbu:224: tathāpy atra śaraṇapragatānāṃ bahuduṣkarakāryatvāt kecin notsahante ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:225: yasmād ādau duṣkara eṣa vyavasāyo duḥsādho 'sau naikasahasrair api kalpaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:226: siddho yasmāt satvahitādhānamahārthas tasmād agre yāna ihāgraśaraṇārthaḥ // AMsa_2.2 //
T06asmahsbu:227: etena tasya śaraṇagamanavyavasāyasya praṇidhānapratipattiviśeṣābhyāṃ yaśohetutvaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:230: sarvān satvāṃs tārayituṃ yaḥ pratipanno yano jñāne sarvagate kauśalyayuktaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:231: yo nirvāṇe saṃsaraṇe 'py ekaraso 'sau saṃsṛtiśāntyekaraso 'sau jñeyo dhīmān eṣa hi sarvatraga evam // AMsa_2.3 //
T06asmahsbu:236: śaraṇagatim imāṃ gato mahārthāṃ guṇagaṇavṛddhim upaiti so 'prameyām /
T06asmahsbu:237: sphurati jagad idaṃ kṛpāśayena prathayati cāpratimaṃ mahārthadharmam // AMsa_2.4 //
T06asmahsbu:242: na hi sā guṇavṛddhis tarkeṇa prameyā na saṃkhyā na kālenātyantikatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:243: parārthapratipattir āśayataś ca karuṇā sphuraṇena prayogataś ca mahāyānadharmaprathanena /
T06asmahsbu:251: anena gotrasyāstitvam agratvaṃ svabhāvo liṅgaṃ prabheda ādīnavo 'nuśaṃso dvidhāupamyaṃ cety eṣa prabhedaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:254: dhātūnām adhimukteś ca pratipatteś ca bhedataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:257: tasmād evaṃ jātīyako 'pi dhātubhedaḥ pratyetavya iti /
T06asmahsbu:259: adhimuktibhedo 'pi satvānām upalabhyate prathamata eva kasyacit kvacid eva yāde 'dhimuktir bhavati so 'ntareṇa gotrabhedaṃ na syāt /
T06asmahsbu:260: utpāditāyām api ca pratyayavaśenādhimuktau pratipattibheda upalabhyate kaścin nirvohā bhavati kaścin neti so 'ntareṇa gotraprabhedaṃ na syāt
T06asmahsbu:262: so 'ntareṇa gotrabhedaṃ na syāt bījānurūpatvāt phalasya /
T06asmahsbu:267: tad dhi gotraṃ kuśalamulānām udagratve nimittaṃ sarvatve mahārthatve akṣayatve ca /
T06asmahsbu:268: na hi śrāvakāṇāṃ tathodagrāṇi na ca sarvāṇi santi balavaiśāradyādyabhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:272: prakṛtyā paripuṣṭaṃ ca āśrayaś cāśritaṃ ca tat /
T06asmahsbu:275: prakṛtisthaṃ samudānītam āśrayasvabhāvam āśritasvabhāvaṃ ca tad eva yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:277: guṇottāraṇārthana gotraṃ veditavyaṃ guṇā uttaranty asmād uddhavantīti kṛtvā /
T06asmahsbu:280: samācāraḥ subhasyāpi gotre liṅgaṃ nirupyate // AMsa_3.5 //
T06asmahsbu:287: niyatāniyataṃ gotram ahāryaṃ hāryam eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:289: samāsena caturvidhaṃ gotraṃ niyatāniyataṃ tadeva yathākramaṃ pratyayairahāryaṃ hāryaṃ ceti /
T06asmahsbu:293: bodhisatvagotre samāsena caturvidha ādīnavaḥ yena gotrastho 'guṇeṣu pravartate /
T06asmahsbu:299: cirād apāyagamanam āśumokṣaś ca tatra ca /

T06asmahsbu:323: cittasya hi saṃsthitiḥ samādhiḥ mahāsatvaparipākanimittatvāc ca bahusatvaparipācanāt /
T06asmahsbu:326: amokṣabhāgīyaśubho 'sti kaścin nihīnaśuklo 'sty api hetuhīnaḥ // AMsa_3.11 //
T06asmahsbu:333: (Msa 13) atyantāparinirvāṇadharmā tu hetuhīno yasya parinirvāṇagotram eva nāsti /
T06asmahsbu:335: gāmbhīryāudāryavāde parahitakaraṇāyodite dīrghadharme ajñātvaivādhimuktir bhavati suvipulā saṃprapattikṣamā ca /
T06asmahsbu:336: saṃpattiś cāvasāne dvayagataparamā yad bhavaty eva teṣāṃ tajjñeyaṃ bodhisatvaprakṛtiguṇavatas tatprapuṣṭāc ca gotrāt // AMsa_3.12 //
T06asmahsbu:337: yadgābhīryāudāryavādini parahitakriyārthamukte vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme gāmbhīryāudāryārtham ajñātvaivādhimuktir vipulā bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:339: saṃpattiś cāvasāne mahābodhirdvayagatāyāḥ saṃpatteḥ paramā tatprakṛtyā guṇavataḥ paripuṣṭasya ca bodhisatvagotrasya māhātmyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:340: dvayagatā iti dvaye laukikāḥ śrāvakāś ca /
T06asmahsbu:344: svaparahitasukhakriyāphalatvād bhavati samudagrasamūlam udagragotram etat // AMsa_3.13 //
T06asmahsbu:345: svaparahitaphalasya bodhivṛkṣasya praśastamūlatvam anena bodhisatvagotraṃ saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:356: (Msa 14) so 'yaṃ trividho guṇāḥ paridīpitaḥ puruṣakāraguṇo dvābhyāṃ padābhyām arthakriyāguṇaḥ phalaparigrahaguṇaś ca dvābhyāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:358: iti triguṇā dvayālambanā ca cetanā cittotpāda ity ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:373: sadā pāramitāyoganiryāṇaś ca sa kathyate // AMsa_4.5 //
T06asmahsbu:377: kiṃmūla eṣa caturvidho bodhisatvānāṃ cittotpādaḥ kimāśayaḥ kimadhimokṣaḥ kimālambanaḥ kiṃyānaḥ kiṃpratiṣṭhaḥ kimādīnavaḥ kimanuśaṃsaḥ kiṃniryāṇaḥ kiṃparyavasāna iti /
T06asmahsbu:391: yasyāṃ bhūmau yaḥ prayuktas tasya tadbhūmiparyavasānaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:396: yo hi parākhyānāc cittotpādaḥ paravijñāpanāt sa ucyate samādānasāṃketikaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:397: sa punar mitrabalād vā bhavati kalyāṇamitrānurodhāt /
T06asmahsbu:400: chrutabalād vā tatra tatra dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bahūnāṃ bodhicittotpādāt /
T06asmahsbu:401: śubhābhyāsād vā dṛṣṭa iva dharme satataśravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇādibhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:406: dharmeṣu ca satveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve /
T06asmahsbu:409: kauśalyaṃ pariśiṣṭe niryāṇaṃ caiva vijñeyam // AMsa_4.10 //
T06asmahsbu:411: dhyānamaye sukhagarbhe karuṇā saṃvardhikā dhātrī // AMsa_4.11 //
T06asmahsbu:415: āśayaśuddhir jñeyā kauśalyaṃ tv anyabhūmigatam // AMsa_4.13 //
T06asmahsbu:419: sa ca pāramārthikaś cittotpādaḥ pramuditāyāṃ bhūmāv iti /
T06asmahsbu:423: satvakṛtyeṣu samacittatā ātmana iva teṣāṃ duḥkhakṣayākāṅkṣaṇāt /
T06asmahsbu:425: tasminn eva ca pāramārthikacottotpāde ṣaḍarthā veditavyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:426: janma audāryam utsāha āśayaśuddhiḥ pariśiṣṭakauśalyaṃ niryāṇaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:433: kathaṃ manasikāreṇa tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanājñānāt kalpanāmātram etad iti /
T06asmahsbu:446: meghasadṛśaś ca kathitaś cittotpādo jinātmajānāṃ hi /
T06asmahsbu:447: tasmāt tathā guṇāḍhyaṃ cittaṃ muditaiḥ samutpādyam // AMsa_4.20 //
T06asmahsbu:449: āśayasahagataś ca cittotpādaḥ kalyāṇasuvarṇasadṛśo hitasukhādhyāśayasya vikārābhajanāt /
T06asmahsbu:476: mahārhacittodayavarjitā janāḥ śamaṃ gamiṣyanti vihāya tat sukham // AMsa_4.21 //
T06asmahsbu:477: tena cittotpādena varjitāḥ satvāś caturvidhaṃ sukhaṃ na labhante yad bodhisatvānāṃ parārthacintanāt sukhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:480: yac ca paramatvasya dharmanairātmyasya saṃdarśanāt sukhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:482: sahodayāc cittavarasya dhīmataḥ susaṃvṛtaṃ cittam anantaduṣkṛtāt /
T06asmahsbu:483: sukhena duḥkhena ca modate sadā śubhī kṛpāluś ca vivardhanadvayam // AMsa_4.22 //
T06asmahsbu:484: tasya cittavarasya sahodayāt bodhisatvasya susaṃvṛtaṃ cittaṃ bhavaty anantasatvādhiṣṭhānād (Msa 18)
T06asmahsbu:485: duṣkṛtād ato 'sya durgatito bhayaṃ na bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:486: sa ca dvayaṃ vardhayan śubhaṃ ca karma kṛpā ca nityaṃ ca śubhī bhavati kṛpāluś ca tena ca sadā modate /
T06asmahsbu:491: yad ānapekṣaḥ svaśarīrajīvite parārtham abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam /
T06asmahsbu:492: paroghātena tathāvidhaḥ kathaṃ sa duṣkṛte karmaṇi saṃpravatsyati // AMsa_4.23 //
T06asmahsbu:493: asya piṇḍārtho yasya para eva priyataro nātmā parārthaṃ svaśarīrajīvite ānapekṣatvāt abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam /
T06asmahsbu:494: sa katham ātmārthaṃ paroghātena duṣkṛte karmaṇi pravatsyatīti /
T06asmahsbu:496: māyopamān vīkṣya sa sarvadharmān udyānayātrām iva copapattīḥ /
T06asmahsbu:497: kleśāc ca duḥkhāc ca bibheti nāsau saṃpattikāle 'tha vipattikāle // AMsa_4.24 //
T06asmahsbu:498: svakā guṇāḥ satvahitāc ca modaḥ saṃcintyajanma rddhivikurvitaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:499: vibhūṣaṇaṃ bhojanam agrabhūmiḥ krīḍāratir nityakṛpātmakānām // AMsa_4.25 //
T06asmahsbu:500: māyopamasarvadharmalakṣaṇāt sa bodhisatvaḥ saṃpattikāle kleśebhyo na bibheti /
T06asmahsbu:508: parārtham udyogavataḥ kṛpātmano hy avīcir apy eti yato 'sya ramyatām /
T06asmahsbu:509: kutaḥ punas trasyati tādṛśo bhavan parāśrayair duḥkhasamudbhavair bhave // AMsa_4.26 //
T06asmahsbu:510: api ca yasya parārtham udyogavataḥ karuṇātmatvād avīcir apy ramyaḥ sa kathaṃ parārthanimittair
T06asmahsbu:511: duḥkhotpādair bhave punas trāsam āpatsyate yato 'sya duḥkhatrāsaḥ syāc cittasya vyāvṛttir bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:514: parasya kṛtye samupasthite punaḥ paraiḥ samādāpanato 'tilajjanā // AMsa_4.27 //
T06asmahsbu:516: yasya mahākaruṇācāryeṇa nityoṣito ātmā paraduḥkhaiś ca duḥkhitaṃ cetas tasyotpanne parārthaṃ karaṇīye yadi paraiḥ samādāpanā kartavyā bhavati atilajjanā /
T06asmahsbu:518: śirasi vinihitoccasatvabhāraḥ śithilagatir na hi śobhate 'grasatvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:519: svaparavividhabandhanātibaddhaḥ śataguṇam utsaham arhati prakartum // AMsa_4.28 //
T06asmahsbu:520: śirasi mahāntaṃ satvabhāraṃ vinidhāya bodhisatvaḥ śithilaṃ parākramamāṇo na śobhate
T06asmahsbu:521: śataguṇaṃ hi sa vīryaṃ kartum arhati śrāvakavīryāt tathā hi svaparavavidhair vividhair
T06asmahsbu:537: tathātmano 'nyārthaviśiṣṭasaṃjñinaḥ svakārthatā kā katamā parārthatā // AMsa_5.2 //
T06asmahsbu:538: paratrātmasamānacittatāṃ labdhvā 'dhimuktito vā sāṃketikacittotpādalābhe jñānato vā pāramārthikacittotpādalābhe /
T06asmahsbu:539: ātmato vā punaḥ paratra viśiṣṭatarām iṣṭatāṃ labdhvā tenaiva ca kāraṇenātmanaḥ parārthe viśiṣṭasaṃjñino bodhisatvasya (Msa 20)
T06asmahsbu:543: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇā ripau /
T06asmahsbu:544: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate // AMsa_5.3 //
T06asmahsbu:545: yathā svātmanaḥ parārtho viśiṣyate tat sādhayati parārtham ātmano 'tyarthaṃ saṃtāpanāt /
T06asmahsbu:548: vinītir arthe paripācanā śubhe tathāvavādasthitibuddhimuktayaḥ // AMsa_5.4 //
T06asmahsbu:549: guṇair viśiṣṭaiḥ samudāgamas tathā kulodayo vyākaraṇābhiṣiktatā /
T06asmahsbu:550: tathāgatajñānam anuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ // AMsa_5.5 //
T06asmahsbu:551: trividhe satvanikāye hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭagotrasthe trayodaśavidho bodhisatvasya parārthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:561: aṣṭamyāṃ bhūbhau vyākaraṇaṃ daśamyām abhiśekaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:562: saha tathāgatajñānenety eṣa triṣu gotrastheṣu yathāyogaṃ trayodaśavidhaḥ parārtho bodhisatvasya /
T06asmahsbu:565: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā 'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattir uttamā // AMsa_5.6 //
T06asmahsbu:566: yathā 'sau parārthapratipattiḥ saṃpannā bhavati tathā saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:571: na ṛddhā manyate na cāvatāritān satvān mamāyati /
T06asmahsbu:577: na hy adūragatayā pratipattyā kulodayādayaḥ pareṣāṃ kartuṃ śakyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:581: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:582: pratisvam ādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhigame kṛpātmakaḥ // AMsa_5.7 //
T06asmahsbu:583: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārtham udyataḥ sadā tad aprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām /
T06asmahsbu:584: sadā tu dhīro hi parārtham udyato dvayārtham ādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim // AMsa_5.8 //
T06asmahsbu:586: calaṃ viparyāsasukhaṃ rūparūpyabhavapriyāṇām anityatvāt paramārthaduḥkhatvāc ca saṃskāraduḥkhatayā /
T06asmahsbu:588: vimūḍho janaḥ sadā svasukhārthaṃ pratipannaḥ sukhaṃ nāpnoti duḥkham evāpnoti /
T06asmahsbu:589: bodhisatvas tu parārthaṃ pratipannaḥ svaparārthaṃ saṃpādya nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpnoty ayam asyāparaḥ pratipattiviśeṣaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:591: yathā yathā hy akṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:592: tathā tathā yuktasamānatāpadair hitāya satveṣv abhisaṃskaroti tat // AMsa_5.9 //
T06asmahsbu:593: yena yena prakāreṇa cakṣurādīndriyagocare vicitre bodhisatvaḥ pravartate /
T06asmahsbu:594: īryāpathavyāpāracāre vartamānas tena tena prakāreṇa saṃbaddhasādṛśyavacanair hitārthaṃ satveṣu tat sarvam abhisaṃskaroti /
T06asmahsbu:597: sadā 'svatantrīkṛtadoṣacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti buddhimān /
T06asmahsbu:598: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ // AMsa_5.10 //
T06asmahsbu:599: sadā kleśair asvatantrīkṛtacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti bodhisatvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:604: vividhaguṇagaṇair vivardhamānā jagad upaguhya sadā kṛpāśayena // AMsa_5.11 //
T06asmahsbu:606: abhibhavamāhātmyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavatrayaṃ gatiṃ ca pañcavidhām abhibhayagamanāt /
T06asmahsbu:608: rūpaṃ cet subhūta bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvā nadaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhūya niryāsyatīti vistaraḥ /
T06asmahsbu:615: na san na cāsan na tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate /
T06asmahsbu:616: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punar viśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇaṃ // AMsa_6.1 //
T06asmahsbu:622: na jāyate na ca vyety anabhisaṃskṛtatvād dharmadhātoḥ /
T06asmahsbu:623: na hīyate na ca vardhate saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣayor nirodhotpāde tadavasthatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:624: na viśudhyati prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt na ca na viśudhyati āgantukopakleśavigamāt /
T06asmahsbu:625: ity etat pañcavidham advayalakṣaṇaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:627: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayam ātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā /
T06asmahsbu:628: dvayān na cānyad bhrama eṣa tatūditas tataś ca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ // AMsa_6.2 //
T06asmahsbu:632: tathā hi sā vilakṣaṇā ātmalakṣaṇāt parikalpitāt /
T06asmahsbu:634: nāpy ato dvayād anyad ātmalakṣaṇam upapadyate /
T06asmahsbu:636: bhrama eṣa tūtpanno yeyam ātmadṛṣṭis tasmād eva cātmābhāvān mokṣo 'pi bhramamātrasaṃkṣayo veditavyo na tu kaścin muktaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:638: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātram āśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām /
T06asmahsbu:639: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ // AMsa_6.3 //
T06asmahsbu:641: tamaḥ prakāraḥ katamo 'yam īdṛśo yato 'vipaśyan sadasan nirīkṣate // AMsa_6.4 //
T06asmahsbu:642: kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ loko bhrāntimātram ātmadarśanaṃ niśritya satatānubaddhaṃ duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ na paśyati /
T06asmahsbu:648: yadā ca loko bhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati taṃ taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya te te bhāvā bhavantīti /
T06asmahsbu:649: tat katham etāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śrayate 'nyakāritaṃ darśanādikaṃ na pratītyasamutpannam iti /
T06asmahsbu:650: katamo 'yam īdṛśas tamaḥprakāro lokasya yad vidyamānaṃ pratītyasamutpādam avipaśyan na vidyamānam ātmānaṃ nirīkṣate /
T06asmahsbu:651: śakyaṃ hi nāma tamasā vidyamānam adraṣṭuṃ syān na tvavidyamānaṃ draṣṭum iti /
T06asmahsbu:653: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanor iha /
T06asmahsbu:654: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām // AMsa_6.5 //
T06asmahsbu:655: na cāsti saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ paramārthavṛttyā nairātmyasya samatayā /
T06asmahsbu:656: tathāpi janmakṣayān mokṣaprāptir bhavaty eva śubhakarmakāriṇāṃ ye mokṣamārgaṃ bhāvayanti /
T06asmahsbu:658: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāram anantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisatvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:659: dharmeṣu cintāsuviniśriś citatvāj jalpānvayām arthagatiṃ paraiti // AMsa_6.6 //
T06asmahsbu:661: arthān sa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre /
T06asmahsbu:662: pratyakṣatām eti ca dharmadhātus tasmād viyukto dvayalakṣaṇena // AMsa_6.7 //
T06asmahsbu:663: nāstīti cittāt param etya buddhyā cittasya nāstitvam upaiti tasmāt /
T06asmahsbu:664: dvayasya nāstitvam upetya dhīmān saṃtiṣṭhate 'tadgatidharmaghātau // AMsa_6.8 //
T06asmahsbu:666: tadāśrayo gahvaradoṣasaṃcayo mahāgadeneva viṣaṃ nirasyate // AMsa_6.9 //
T06asmahsbu:667: ekena saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratvaṃ dharmacintāsuviniśritatvaṃ samādhiniśrityabhāvanāt manojalpāc ca teṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthaprakhyānāvagamāt tatpraveśaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:669: dvitīyena manojalpamātrānarthān viditvā tadābhāse cittamātre 'vasthānamiyaṃ bodhisatvasya nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthā /
T06asmahsbu:670: tataḥ pareṇa dharmadhātoḥ pratyakṣato gamane dvayalakṣaṇena viyukto grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena iyaṃ darśanamārgāvasthā /
T06asmahsbu:671: tṛtīyena yathāsau dhamadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti tad darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:673: cittād anyadālambanaṃ grāhyaṃ nāstīty avagamya buddhyā tasyāpi cittamātrasya nāstitvāvagamanaṃ grāhyaṃbhāve grāhakābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:674: dvaye cāsya nāstitvaṃ viditvā dharmadhātau avasthānam atadgatir grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhyāṃ rahita evaṃ dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti /
T06asmahsbu:676: sadā sarvatra samatānugatenāvikalpajñānabalena yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre
T06asmahsbu:677: svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūra-anupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcayasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva viṣasya nirasanāt /
T06asmahsbu:680: smṛtim agatim avagamya kalpamātrāṃ vrajati guṇārṇavapāramāśudhīraḥ // AMsa_6.10 //
T06asmahsbu:681: buddhavihite sudharme suvyavasthāpite sa paramārthajñānapraviṣṭo bodhisatvaḥ saṃpiṇḍitadharmālambanasya
T06asmahsbu:682: mūlacittasya dharmadhātau matim upanividhāya yā smṛtir upalabhyate tāṃ sarvāṃ smṛtipravṛttiṃ
T06asmahsbu:683: kalpanāmātrām avagacchaty evaṃ guṇārṇavasya pāraṃ buddhatvam āśu vrajatīty etat paramārthajñānasya māhātmyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:690: jñānaṃ hi sarvatragasaprabhedeṣv avyāhataṃ dhīr agataḥ prabhāvaḥ // AMsa_7.1 //
T06asmahsbu:692: vāci jñānaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñāyāṃ vācaṃ tatra gatvopapannā bhāṣante /
T06asmahsbu:696: niḥsaraṇe jñānam āsravakṣayābhijñā yathā satvā upapattito niḥsarantīti /
T06asmahsbu:697: eṣu ṣaṭsvartheṣu sarvatra lokadhātau sapramedeṣu padāparokṣam avyāhataṃ jñānaṃ sa prabhāvo bodhisatvānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñāsaṃgṛhītaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:702: yena niśrayeṇa yena jñānena yena manasikāreṇa tasya prabhāvasya samudāgamas tatsaṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:704: yenāryadivyāpratimair vihārair brāhmaiś ca nityaṃ viharaty udāraiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:705: buddhāṃś ca satvāṃś ca sa dikṣu gatvā saṃmānayaty ānayate viśuddhim // AMsa_7.3 //
T06asmahsbu:707: ātmana āryādisukhavihāram atulyaṃ cotkṛṣṭaṃ ca lokadhātvantareṣu gatvā buddhānāṃ pūjanaṃ satvānāṃ viśodhanaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:710: māyopamān paśyati lokadhātūn sarvān sasatvān savivartanāśān /
T06asmahsbu:711: saṃdarśayaty eva ca tān yatheṣṭaṃ vaśī vicitrair api sa prakāraiḥ // AMsa_7.4 //
T06asmahsbu:713: svayaṃ ca sarvalokadhātūnāṃ sasatvānāṃ savivartasaṃvartānāṃ māyopamatvadarśanāt /
T06asmahsbu:720: raśmipramokṣair bhṛśaduḥkhitāṃś ca āpāyikān svargagatān karoti /
T06asmahsbu:721: mārānvayān kṣubdhavimānaśobhān saṃkampayaṃ srāsayate samārān // AMsa_7.5 //
T06asmahsbu:727: sakarmajanmottamanirmitaiś ca satvārtham ātiṣṭhati sarvakālam // AMsa_7.6 //
T06asmahsbu:728: aprameyasamādhivikrīḍitasaṃdarśanāt buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalamadhye trividhena nirmāṇena sadā satvārthakaraṇāc ca /
T06asmahsbu:734: abuddhanāmeṣu ca buddhanāma saṃśrāvaṇāt tān kṣipate 'nyadhātau // AMsa_7.7 //
T06asmahsbu:738: lokadhātuṣūpapannānāṃ satvānāṃ buddhanāmasaṃśrāvaṇayā prasādaṃ grāhayitvā tadavirahiteṣu lokadhātuṣūpapādanāt /
T06asmahsbu:740: śakto bhavaty eva ca satvapāke saṃjātapakṣaḥ śakunir yathaiva /
T06asmahsbu:741: buddhāt praśaṃsāṃ labhate 'timātrām ādeyavākyo bhavati prajānām // AMsa_7.8 //
T06asmahsbu:745: ṣaḍdhāpy abhijñā trividhā ca vidyā aṣṭau vimokṣā 'bhibhuvas tathā'ṣṭau /
T06asmahsbu:746: daśāpi kṛtsnāyatanāny ameyāḥ samādhayo dhīragataḥ prabhāvaḥ // AMsa_7.9 //
T06asmahsbu:749: evaṃ ṣaḍarthena vibhāgalakṣaṇena prabhāvaṃ darśayitvā tanmāhātmyodbhāvanārthaṃ ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:750: sa hi paramavaśitvalabdhabuddhir jagadavaśaṃ svavaśe vidhāya nityam /
T06asmahsbu:751: parahitakaraṇaikatābhirāmaś carati bhaveṣu hi siṃhavat sudhīraḥ // AMsa_7.10 //
T06asmahsbu:753: vaśitāmāhātmyaṃ svayaṃ paramajñānavaśitvaprāptyā kleśāsvavaśasya jagataḥ svavaśe sthāpanāt /
T06asmahsbu:760: rūciḥ prasādaḥ praśamo 'nukampanā kṣamātha medhā prabalatvam eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:761: ahāryatāṅgaiḥ samupetatā bhṛśaṃ jinātmaje tatparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.1 //
T06asmahsbu:763: rucir mahāyānadeśanādharme prasādas taddeśike praśamaḥ kleśānām anukampā satveṣu
T06asmahsbu:764: kṣamā duṣkaracaryāyāṃ medhā grahaṇadhāraṇaprativedheṣu prabalatvam adhigame ahāryatā
T06asmahsbu:767: eṣa samāsena bodhisatvānāṃ navaprakāra ātmaparipāko veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:777: yaś ca tasyāḥ paripāka ugravīryaparārdhaniṣṭhāyuktaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:781: jinātmaje śāstari saṃprapattaye mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.3 //
T06asmahsbu:782: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:783: guṇajñatā ity api sa bhagavāṃs tathāgata iti vistareṇa kāraṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:788: jīnātmaje kleśavinodanāya tan mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.4 //
T06asmahsbu:790: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:795: kṛpā prakṛtyā paraduḥkhadarśanaṃ nihīnacittasya ca saṃpravarjanam /
T06asmahsbu:797: svaprakṛtyā ca gotreṇa paraduḥkhadarśanena nihīnayānaparivarjanatayā ca paripacyata iti kāraṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:803: dhṛtiḥ sahanaṃ kṣāntir iti paryāyās tatparipāke gotraṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ bhāvanā ca kāraṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:808: smṛter mahābuddhyudaye ca yogyatā sumedhatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.7 //
T06asmahsbu:810: śrutacintitabhāvitacirakṛtacirabhāṣitānām asaṃmoṣatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitārthasupraviṣṭatā ca smṛter medhāparipākasvabhāvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:815: tatra puṇyajñānadvayena tasya puṇyajñānadvayasya bījapuṣṭatā tatparipāke kāraṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:820: punaḥ sadā māranirantarāyatā ahāryatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.9 //
T06asmahsbu:823: māranirantarāyatā svabhāvo yadā māro na punaḥ śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ /
T06asmahsbu:827: jinātmaje hy aṅgasamanvaye punar mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.10 //
T06asmahsbu:832: iti navavidhavas tu pācitātmā paraparipācanayogyatām upetaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:839: vraṇe 'pi bhojye paripāka iṣyate yathaiva tatsrāvaṇabhogayogyatā /
T06asmahsbu:844: evaṃ satvānām āśraye vraṇabhojanasthānīye srāvaṇasthānīyaṃ vipakṣaśamanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:849: vipācanoktā paripācanā tathā prapācanā cāpy anupācanāparā /
T06asmahsbu:850: supācanā cāpy adhipācanā matā nipācanotpācananā ca dehiṣu // AMsa_8.13 //
T06asmahsbu:863: tathā na mātā na pitā na bandhavaḥ suteṣu bandhuṣv api suvyavasthitāḥ // AMsa_8.14 //
T06asmahsbu:864: tathājano nātmani vatsalo mataḥ kuto 'pi susnigdhaparāśraye jane /
T06asmahsbu:865: yathā kṛpātmā parasatvavatsalo hite sukhe caiva niyojanātmataḥ // AMsa_8.15 //
T06asmahsbu:867: yādṛśenāśayena bodhisatvaḥ satvān paripācayati tam āśayaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:869: ātmavatsalas tu loka ātmānaṃ hite ca sukhe ca saṃniyojayati /
T06asmahsbu:870: avaśiṣṭaiḥ ślokair yena prayogeṇa satvān paripācayati taṃ pāramitāpratipattyā saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:871: yādṛśena dānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:872: na bodhisatvasya śarīrabhogayoḥ pareṣv adeyaṃ punar asti sarvathā /
T06asmahsbu:873: anugraheṇa dvividhena pācayan paraṃ samair dānaguṇair na tṛpyate // AMsa_8.16 //
T06asmahsbu:879: yādṛśena śīlena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:881: paraṃparānugrahakṛt dvidhā pare vipākaniṣyandaguṇena pācakaḥ // AMsa_8.17 //
T06asmahsbu:894: yādṛśyā kṣāntyā yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:901: saṃparāyānugraheṇa copāyajñas tair apakāramarṣaṇair āvarjyāpakāriṇāṃ kuśale samādāpanāt /
T06asmahsbu:902: yādṛśena vīryeṇa yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:903: punaḥ sa yatnaṃ paramaṃ samāśrito na khidyate kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:904: jinātmajaḥ satvagaṇaṃ prapācayan paraikacittasya śubhasya kāraṇāt // AMsa_8.19 //
T06asmahsbu:908: kuśalacittasaṃniyojanāt dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyānugraheṇeti yādṛśena dhyānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:909: vaśitvam āgamya manasy anuttaraṃ paraṃ samāvarjayate 'tra śāsane /
T06asmahsbu:910: nihatya sarvām avamānakāmatāṃ śubhena saṃvardhayate ca taṃ punaḥ // AMsa_8.20 //
T06asmahsbu:911: prāptānuttaravaśitvena dhyānena nirāmiṣeṇa ca nihatasarvāvamānābhilāṣeṇa paripācayati /
T06asmahsbu:912: buddhaśāsane parasyāvarjanād āvarjitasya ca kuśaladharmasaṃvardhanāt paripācayati /
T06asmahsbu:913: yādṛśyā prajñayā yathā satvān paripācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:914: sa tatvabhāvārthanaye suniścitaḥ karoti satvān suvinītasaṃśayān /
T06asmahsbu:915: tataś ca te tajjinaśāsanād arād vivardhayante svaparaṃ guṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ // AMsa_8.21 //
T06asmahsbu:916: sa bodhisatvas tatvārthanaye cābhiprāyārthanaye ca suviniścitayā prajñayā paripācayati /
T06asmahsbu:920: iti sugatigatau śubhatraye vā jagad akhilaṃ kṛpayā sa bodhisatvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:922: anena yatra ca vinayati sugatigamane yānatraye vā /
T06asmahsbu:927: yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tatparidīpanāt samāsena paripākamāhātmyaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:928: tatra tanuḥ prakāro 'dhimukticaryābhūmau bodhisatvasya paramo 'ṣṭamyādiṣu vimadhyamaḥ saptasu veditavyaḥ yāval lokasya bhāvas tatsamānayā gatyā atyantam ity arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:938: kṛtvā duṣkaram adbhutaṃ śramaśataiḥ saṃcityasarvaśubhaṃ kālenottamakalpayānamahatā sarvāvṛtīnāṃ kṣayāt /
T06asmahsbu:939: sūkṣmasyāvaraṇasya bhūmiṣu gatasyotpāṭanād buddhatā ratnānām iva sā prabhāvamahatāṃ peṭā samuddhātitā // AMsa_9.3 //
T06asmahsbu:940: samudāgamataḥ svabhāvata aupamyataś ca buddhatvam udbhāvitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:941: yāvadbhir duṣkaraśatair yāvadbhiḥ kuśalasaṃbhārair yāvatā kālena yāvataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇasya prahāṇāt samudāgacchatyayaṃ samudāgamaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:945: sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ dharmo naiva na kaścana /
T06asmahsbu:946: śukladharmamayaṃ tac ca na ca tais tannirūpyate // AMsa_9.4 //
T06asmahsbu:949: sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ tathatāyā abhinnatvāt tadviśuddhiprabhāvitatvāc ca buddhatvasya
T06asmahsbu:950: na ca kaś ciddharmo 'sti parikalpitena dharmasvabhāvena śukladharmamayaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ
T06asmahsbu:952: na ca tais tān nirdiśyate pāramitādīnāṃ pāramitādibhāvenāpariniṣpatter idam advayalakṣaṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:954: deśanā dharmaratnānāṃ tatprabhavatvāt kuśalasasyānāṃ ca vineyasaṃtānakṣetreṣu /
T06asmahsbu:955: buddhatvaṃ sarvadharmaḥ samuditam atha vā sarvadharmavyapetaṃ prodbhūter dharmaratnapratatasumahato dharmaratnākarābham /
T06asmahsbu:956: bhūtānāṃ śuklasasya prasavasumahato hetuto meghabhūtaṃ dānād dharmāmbuvarṣapratatasuvihitasyākṣayasya prajāsu // AMsa_9.6 //
T06asmahsbu:957: anena tṛtīyena ślokena tam evārthaṃ nirdiśati /
T06asmahsbu:958: sumahataḥ pratatasya dharmaratnasya prodbhūter nimittatvād ratnākarābhaṃ bhūtānāṃ mahataḥ śuklasasya prasavahetutvān meghabhūtaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:959: mahataḥ suvihitasyākṣayasya dharmāmbuvarṣasya dānāt prajāsv ity ayam atra padavigraho veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:965: satkāyād dhīnayānāc ca tasmāc charaṇam uttamam // AMsa_9.8 //
T06asmahsbu:968: yad buddhānubhāvena andhāś cakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante badhirāḥ śrotraṃ vikṣiptacittāḥ svasthacittamītayaḥ śāmyantīty evam ādi /
T06asmahsbu:969: apāyaparitrāṇatvaṃ buddhaprabhayā tadgatānāṃ mokṣaṇāt tadagamane ca pratiṣṭhāpanāt /
T06asmahsbu:973: śaraṇam anupamaṃ tacchreṣṭhabuddhatvam iṣṭaṃ jananamaraṇasarvakleśapāpeṣu rakṣā /
T06asmahsbu:975: anena tṛtīyena tasyaiva śaraṇatvasyānupamaśreṣṭhasya cānuttaryaṃ tenaivārthena darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:976: bauddhair dharmair yac ca susaṃpūrṇaśarīraṃ yat saddharme vetti sa satvān pravinetum /
T06asmahsbu:977: yātaṃ pāraṃ yatkṛpayā sarvajagatsu tad buddhatvaṃ śreṣṭham iha eṣyaṃ śaraṇānām // AMsa_9.10 //
T06asmahsbu:978: anena caturthena yaiḥ kāraṇais tat tathānuttaraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:980: svārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya saddharmasatvavinayopāyajñānāt karuṇāpāragamanāc ca parārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya /
T06asmahsbu:981: ālokāt kālāt sarvasatvānāṃ buddhatvaṃ śaraṇaṃ mahat /
T06asmahsbu:983: anena pañcamena ślokena yāvantaṃ kālaṃ yāvatāṃ satvānāṃ yatrārthe śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat samāsena darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:986: kleśajñeyavṛtīnāṃ satatam anugataṃ bījam utkṛṣṭakālaṃ yasminn astaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:987: buddhatvaṃ śukladharmapravaraguṇayutā āśrayasyānyathāptis tatprāptir nirvikalpād viṣayasumahato jñānamārgāt suśuddhāt // AMsa_9.12 //
T06asmahsbu:994: sthitaś ca tasmin sa tathāgato jagan mahācalendrastha ivābhyudīkṣate /
T06asmahsbu:995: śamābhirāmaṃ karūṇāyate janamaghābhirāme 'nyajane tu kā kathā // AMsa_9.13 //
T06asmahsbu:997: tatstho hi mahācalendrastha iva dūrāntaranikṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ paśyati /
T06asmahsbu:998: dṛṣṭvā ca karuṇāyate śrāvakapratyekabuddhān api prāg eva tadanyān /
T06asmahsbu:999: pravṛttir ūddhittir avṛtir āśrayo nivṛttir āvṛttir atho dvayādvayā /
T06asmahsbu:1000: samāviśiṣṭā api sarvagātmikā tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttir iṣyate // AMsa_9.14 //
T06asmahsbu:1002: sā hi tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttiḥ parārthavṛttir iti pravṛttiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1013: yathāmbaraṃ sarvagataṃ sadāmataṃ tathaiva tat sarvagataṃ sadāmatam /
T06asmahsbu:1014: yathāmbaraṃ rūpagaṇeṣu sarvagaṃ tathaiva tat satvagaṇeṣu sarvagam // AMsa_9.15 //
T06asmahsbu:1015: anena caturthena tatsvabhāvasya buddhatvasya sarvagatatvaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:1017: satvagaṇeṣu sarvagatatvaṃ buddhatvasyātmatvena sarvasatvopagamane pariniṣpattito veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1019: tatha duṣṭeṣu satveṣu buddhabimbaṃ na dṛśyate // AMsa_9.16 //
T06asmahsbu:1021: anena pañcamena sarvagatatve 'pyabhājanabhūteṣu satveṣu abuddhabimbadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntena sādhayati /
T06asmahsbu:1023: buddheṣv api tathā jñeyaṃ saṃdarśanamadarśanam // AMsa_9.17 //
T06asmahsbu:1024: anena ṣaṣṭhena buddhavineyeṣu satsu buddhotpādāt taddarśanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1028: tathā jine vinābhogaṃ deśanāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ // AMsa_9.18 //
T06asmahsbu:1030: buddheṣv api vinābhogaṃ tathā kṛtyanidarśanam // AMsa_9.19 //
T06asmahsbu:1031: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyām anābhogena buddhakāryaṃ sādhayaty aghaṭitatūryaśabdamaṇiprabhāvasādharmyeṇa /
T06asmahsbu:1034: yathākāśe kriyāṇāṃ hi hānir abhyudayaḥ sadā /
T06asmahsbu:1037: ākāśa iva lokakriyāṇām avicchede 'pi cānyānyakriyodayavyayas tathaiva /
T06asmahsbu:1040: na śuddhā nāpi cāśuddhā tathatā buddhatā matā // AMsa_9.22 //
T06asmahsbu:1046: tatra cānāsrave dhātau buddhānāṃ paramātmā nirdiśyate /
T06asmahsbu:1049: agraṃ nairātmyaṃ viśuddhā tathatā sā ca buddhānām ātmā svabhāvārthena tasyāṃ viśuddhāyām agraṃ nairātmyam ātmānaṃ buddhā labhante śuddhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1050: ataḥ śuddhātmalābhitvāt buddhā ātmamāhātmyaṃ prāptā ity anenābhisaṃdhinā buddhānām anāsrave dhātau paramātmā vyavasthāpyate /
T06asmahsbu:1051: na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvo buddhatvaṃ tena kathyate /
T06asmahsbu:1053: tenaiva kāraṇena buddhatvaṃ na bhāva ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:1056: ato buddhasya bhāvābhāvapraśne bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇān na bhavatīty evamādir avyākṛtanayo mataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1057: dāhaśāntir yathā lohe darśane timirasya ca /
T06asmahsbu:1058: cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate // AMsa_9.25 //
T06asmahsbu:1059: yathā ca lohe dāhaśāntir darśane ca timiram etasya śāntir na bhāvo dāhatimirayor abhāvalakṣaṇatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1061: evaṃ buddhānāṃ cittajñāne ca dāhatimirasthānīyayo rāgāvidyayoḥ śāntir na bhāvaḥ śasyate tadabhāvaprabhāvitatvāc cetaḥprajñāvimuktyā nābhāvas tena tena vimuktilakṣaṇena bhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1062: buddhānām amale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca /
T06asmahsbu:1071: etau ratnākarameghopamatve pūrṇacandramahādityopamatve ca ślokau gatārthau /
T06asmahsbu:1073: sadaikakāryā vartante lokam ālokayanti ca // AMsa_9.29 //
T06asmahsbu:1080: bhānos tathaiva buddhānāṃ jñeyā jñānaviniḥsṛtiḥ // AMsa_9.31 //
T06asmahsbu:1081: ekakāle sarvaraśmiviniḥsṛtyā sa ca buddhānām ekakāle jñānapravṛttiṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:1083: tathaiva buddhajñānānāṃ vṛttau nāsti mamāyitam // AMsa_9.32 //
T06asmahsbu:1085: sakṛt jñeyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ buddhajñānaiḥ prabhāsyate // AMsa_9.33 //
T06asmahsbu:1091: tathā buddhajñānānām āvaraṇaṃ satvānām ābhājanatvena duṣṭatā pañcakaṣāyātyutsadatayā /
T06asmahsbu:1094: yathā pāṃśuviśeṣeṇa vastre raṅgavicitratā kvacid avicitratā /
T06asmahsbu:1099: buddhānām etad uditaṃ raṅgair vākāśacitraṇā // AMsa_9.36 //
T06asmahsbu:1100: etad anāsravadhātau buddhānāṃ trividhaṃ gāmbhīryam evam uktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1104: tat punar lakṣaṇagāmbhīryaṃ viśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ paramātmalakṣaṇam avyākṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vimuktilakṣaṇaṃ cārabhyoktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1108: seyamanāsrave dhātau niṣprapañcatvād ākāśopame gāmbhīryaprabhedadeśanā yathā raṅgair ākāśacitraṇī veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:1110: tathāgatatvaṃ tasmāc ca tadgarbhāḥ sarvadehinaḥ // AMsa_9.37 //
T06asmahsbu:1111: sarveṣāṃ nirviśiṣṭā tathatā tadviśuddhisvabhāvaś ca tathāgataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1112: ataḥ sarve satvās tathāgatagarbhā ity ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:1118: ābhyāṃ tāvad dvābhyāṃ prabhāvotkarṣaviśeṣeṇa buddhānāṃ vibhutvaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:1119: aprameyam acintyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ bauddham iṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:1120: yasya yatra yathā yāvat kāle yasmin pravartate // AMsa_9.40 //
T06asmahsbu:1121: anena tṛtīyena prakāraprabhedagāmbhīryaviśeṣābhyāṃ katham aprameyaṃ kathaṃ vācintyam ity āha /
T06asmahsbu:1122: yasya pudgalasyārthe tat pravartate yatra lokadhātau yathā tādṛśaiḥ prakārair yāvad alpaṃ (Msa 41)
T06asmahsbu:1132: manasaḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvānucare nirvikalpe suviśuddhe jñāne paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
T06asmahsbu:1136: arthaparāvṛttau udgraharparāvṛttau ca kṣetraviśuddhivibhutvaṃ paramaṃ labhyate yena yathākāmaṃ bhogasaṃdarśanaṃ karoti /
T06asmahsbu:1138: vikalpaparāvṛttau sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca sarvakālam avyāghāte paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
T06asmahsbu:1140: apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānām acale male pade // AMsa_9.45 //
T06asmahsbu:1141: pratiṣṭhāparāvṛttāv apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate buddhānām anāsrave dhātau /
T06asmahsbu:1145: maithunasya parāvṛttau dvayor buddhasukhavihāre ca dārā 'saṃkleśadarśane ca /
T06asmahsbu:1148: ākāśasaṃjñāvyāvṛttau dvayor eva cintitārthasamṛddhau ca yena gaganagarbho bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:1153: tatra cāprameyaṃ vibhutvam acintyakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ buddhānām anāsrave dhātau veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1155: śubhe vṛddho loko vrajati suviśuddhau paramatāṃ śubhe cānārabdhvā vrajati śubhavṛddhau paramatām /
T06asmahsbu:1156: vrajaty evaṃ loko diśi diśi jinānāṃ sukathitair apakvaḥ pakvo vā na ca punar aśeṣaṃ dhruvam iha // AMsa_9.49 //
T06asmahsbu:1157: anena yādṛśasya paripākasya nimittaṃ bhavati taddarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:1158: upacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca vimuktau paramatāyām anupacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca kuśalamūlopacaye /
T06asmahsbu:1159: apakvaḥ śubhavṛddhau paramatāṃ vrajanapākaṃ vrajati pakvaḥ suviśuddhau paramatāṃ vrajati /
T06asmahsbu:1160: evaṃ ca nityakālaṃ vrajati na ca niḥśeṣaṃ lokasyānantatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1161: tathā kṛtvā caryāṃ kṛcchrāvāpyāṃ paramaguṇayogād bhutavartī mahābodhiṃ nityāṃ dhruvam aśaraṇānāṃ ca śaraṇam /
T06asmahsbu:1162: labhante yaddhīrā daśadig sadā sadā sarvasamayaṃ tad āścaryaṃ loke suvidhacaraṇān nādbhutam api // AMsa_9.50 //
T06asmahsbu:1163: anena dvitīyena paripakvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ paripākasyāścaryaṃ nāścaryaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1164: (Msa 43) lakṣaṇaṃ sadā sarvasamayam iti nityaṃ nirantaraṃ ca tad anubhūya mārgacaraṇaṃ suvidhicaraṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1165: kvaciddharmāñ ca kaṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ bahumukhaśatair darśayati yaḥ kvacij janmāntardhiṃ kvacid api vicitrāṃ janacarīm /
T06asmahsbu:1166: kvacitkṛtsnāṃ bodhiṃ kvacid api ca nirvāṇam asakṛt na ca sthānāt tasmād vicalati sa sarvaṃ ca kurute // AMsa_9.51 //
T06asmahsbu:1170: na ca sthānāc calatīty anāsravād dhātoḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1171: na buddhānām evaṃ bhavati mama pakvo 'yam iti cāprapācyo 'yaṃ dehī api ca adhunāpācyata iti /
T06asmahsbu:1172: vinā saṃskāraṃ tu prapacam upayāty eva janatā śubhair dharmair nityaṃ diśi diśi samantāt trayamukham // AMsa_9.52 //
T06asmahsbu:1175: yathāyatnaṃ bhānuḥ pratataviṣadair aṃśavisaraiḥ prapākakaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte /
T06asmahsbu:1176: tathā dharmārko 'pi praśamavidhidharmāṃśuvisaraiḥ prapākaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte // AMsa_9.53 //
T06asmahsbu:1178: yathaikasmād dīpād bhavati sumahān dīpanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca sa punar eti vyayamataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1179: yathaikasmād buddhād pākābhavati sumahān paripākapākanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca punar eti punar upaiti vyayamataḥ // AMsa_9.54 //
T06asmahsbu:1182: yathā toyais tṛptiṃ vrajati na mahāsāgara iva na vṛddhiṃ vā yāti pratataviṣadāmbu praviśanaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1183: tathā bauddhau dhātuḥ satatasamitaiḥ śuddhiviśanair na tṛptiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā vrajati paramāścaryam iha tat // AMsa_9.55 //
T06asmahsbu:1184: anena saptamena paripakvānāṃ vimuktipraveśe samudrodāharaṇena dharmadhātor atṛptiṃ cāvakāśadānād avṛddhiṃ dhyānādhikatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1193: eṣa hetvarthaṃ phalārthaṃ cārabhya dvitīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1199: eṣa karmārthaṃ yogārthaṃ cārabhya tṛtīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1200: trividhiṃ kāyādinirmāṇaṃ karma samādhidhāraṇīmukhābhyāṃ dvayena cāprameyeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa samanvāgamo yogaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1208: kāyabhedā hi buddhānāṃ prathamas tu dvayāśrayaḥ // AMsa_9.60 //
T06asmahsbu:1214: kṣetraiś ca nāmabhiḥ kāyair dharmasaṃbhogaceṣṭitaiḥ // AMsa_9.61 //
T06asmahsbu:1215: tatra sāṃbhogikaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍalabuddhakṣetranām aśarīradharmasaṃbhogakriyābhir bhinnaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1216: samaḥ sūkṣmaś ca tacchiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ svābhāviko mataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1220: tena sāṃbhogikena kāyena saṃbaddhaḥ saṃbhogavibhutve ca hetur yatheṣṭaṃ bhogadarśanāya /
T06asmahsbu:1223: nairmāṇikas tu kāyo buddhānām aprameyaprabhedaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ sāṃbhogikaḥ svāthasaṃpattilakṣaṇaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1225: evaṃ dvayārthasaṃpattir yathākramaṃ dvayoḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ sāṃbhogike ca kāye nairmāṇike ca /
T06asmahsbu:1228: sa punar nirmāṇakāyaḥ sadā vineyārthaṃ śilpasya vīṇāvādanādibhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1230: nirvāṇasya ca darśanair vimocane mahopāyatvāt parārthasaṃpattilakṣaṇo veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1231: tribhiḥ kāyais tu vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1232: sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho yas tribhiḥ kāyair nirdarśitaḥ // AMsa_9.65 //
T06asmahsbu:1233: tribhiś ca kāyair buddhānāṃ sarvakāyasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1234: ebhis tribhiḥ kāyaiḥ sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho nidarśitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1235: dvayoḥ svaparārthaprabhāvitatvāt dvayoś ca tadāśritatvād yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1238: te ca trayaḥ kāyāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yathākramaṃ tribhir nirviśeṣā āśrayeṇa dharmadhātor abhinnatvāt āśayena pṛthak buddhāśayasyābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1240: teṣu ca triṣu kāyeṣu yathākramaṃ trividhā nityatā veditavyā yena nityakāyās tathāgatā ucyante /
T06asmahsbu:1247: caturvidhaṃ buddhānāṃ jñānam ādarśajñānaṃ samatājñānaṃ pratyavekṣājñānaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:1248: ādarśajñānam acalaṃ trīṇi jñānāni tadāśritāni calāni /
T06asmahsbu:1250: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ na ca teṣv āmukhaṃ sadā // AMsa_9.68 //
T06asmahsbu:1251: ādarśajñānam amamam aparicchinnaṃ deśataḥ sadānugaṃ kālataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1252: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ sadāvaraṇavigamāt na ca teṣv āmukham anākāratvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1256: teṣāṃ ca samatādijñānānāṃ sarvaprakārāṇāṃ hetutvāt sarvajñānānāmākaropamaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1260: yadbodhisatvenābhisamayakāleṣu samatājñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ tadbhāvanāśuddhito budhiprāptasyāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇe niviṣṭaṃ samatājñānamiṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:1263: mahāmaitrīkaruṇābhyāṃ sarvakālānugaṃ yathādhimokṣaṃ ca satvānāṃ buddhabimbanidarśakaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1264: yataḥ kecit satvās tathāgataṃ nīlavarṇaṃ paśyanti kecit pītavarṇam ity evamādi /
T06asmahsbu:1266: dhāraṇīnāṃ samādhīnāṃ nidhānopamam eva ca // AMsa_9.72 //
T06asmahsbu:1272: kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu nirmāṇair nānāprakārair aprameyair acintyaiś ca sarvasatvārthakaraṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1274: acintyaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ tac ca sarvathā // AMsa_9.75 //
T06asmahsbu:1275: tac ca buddhanirmāṇaṃ sadā sarvathā cācintyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1286: eka eva buddha ity etann eṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:1292: puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravaiyarthyaṃ ca syād anyeṣāṃ bodhisatvānām anabhisaṃbodhān na ca yuktaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1293: tasmād avaiyarthyād api naika eva buddhaḥ satvārthakriyāsākalyaṃ ca na syāt /
T06asmahsbu:1294: buddhasya buddhatve kasyacit apratiṣṭhāpanād etac ca na yuktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1295: na ca kaścid ādibuddho 'sti vinā saṃbhāreṇa buddhatvāyogād vinā cānyena buddhena saṃsthānāyogād ity anāditvād apy eko buddho na yuktaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1296: bahutvam api neṣyate buddhānāṃ dharmakāyasyābhedād anāsrave dhātau /
T06asmahsbu:1299: sarvathā 'nupalambhaś ca upalambhaḥ paro mataḥ // AMsa_9.78 //
T06asmahsbu:1300: yā parikalpitena svabhāvenāvidyamānatā saiva paramā vidyamānatā pariniṣpannena svabhāvena /
T06asmahsbu:1301: yaś ca sarvathā 'nupalambhaḥ parikalpitasya svabhāvasya sa eva parama upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannasvabhāvasya /
T06asmahsbu:1303: pratilambhaḥ paraś ceṣṭaḥ pratilambhaṃ ca paśyatām // AMsa_9.79 //
T06asmahsbu:1304: saiva paramā bhāvanā yo bhāvanāyā anupalambhaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1305: sa eva paramaḥ pratilambho yaḥ pratilambhānupalambhaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1306: paśyatāṃ gurutvaṃ tāṃ dīrghaṃ nimittaṃ vīryam ātmanaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1307: mānināṃ bodhisatvānāṃ dūre bodhir nirūpyate // AMsa_9.80 //
T06asmahsbu:1308: ye ca gurutvaṃ bahutvaṃ paśyanti adbhutadharmayuktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1313: teṣām evaṃ mānināṃ bodhisatvānām aupalambhikatvāt dūre bodhir nirūpyate /
T06asmahsbu:1316: kalpanāmātraṃ tv etat sarvam iti paśyatāṃ tasyāpi kalpanāmātrasyāvikalpanād akalpabodhisatvānām anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāvasthāyām arthataḥ prāptaiva bodhir ity ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:1318: bhinnāśrayā bhinnajalāś ca nadyaḥ alpodakāḥ kṛtyapṛthaktvakāryāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1320: samudraviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarvā ekāśrayā ekamahājalāś ca /
T06asmahsbu:1321: miśraikakāryāś ca mahopabhogyā jalāśritaprāṇigaṇasya nityam // AMsa_9.83 //
T06asmahsbu:1322: bhinnāśrayā bhinnamatāś ca dhīrāḥ svalpāvabodhāḥ pṛthagātmakṛtyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1324: buddhatvaviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarve ekāśrayā ekamahāvabodhāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1325: miśrekakāryāś ca mahopabhogyāḥ sadā mahāsatvagaṇasya te hi // AMsa_9.85 //
T06asmahsbu:1332: śubhaparamasukhākṣayākaratvāt śubhamatir arhati bodhicittam āptum // AMsa_9.86 //
T06asmahsbu:1342: ādiḥ siddhiḥ śaraṇaṃ gotraṃ citte tathaiva cotpādaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1344: eṣa ca bodhyadhikāra ādim ārabhya yāvat bodhipaṭalānusāreṇānugantavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1346: jātājātā grāhikā grāhyabhūtā mitrādāttā svātmato bhrāntikā ca /
T06asmahsbu:1347: abhrāntānyā āmukhā naiva cānyā ghoṣācārā caiṣikā cekṣikā ca // AMsa_10.2 //
T06asmahsbu:1361: hāryā kīrṇā 'vyāvakīrṇā vipakṣair hīnodārā āvṛtā 'nāvṛtā ca /
T06asmahsbu:1362: yuktā 'yuktā saṃbhṛtā 'saṃbhṛtā ca gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā dūragā cādhimuktiḥ // AMsa_10.3 //
T06asmahsbu:1400: avipraṇāśaḥ sthairyaṃ ca viśeṣagamanaṃ tathā // AMsa_10.7 //
T06asmahsbu:1409: bhrāntikāyāmāmukhāyāṃ śrutamayādikāyāṃ ca yāvat madhyāyāṃ viśeṣagamanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1415: bhṛtyopamā svārthināṃ sā rājaprakhyā parārthinām // AMsa_10.9 //
T06asmahsbu:1416: yathā śvā duḥkhārtaḥ satatam avitṛptaḥ kṣudhitako yathā kūrmaś cāsau jalavivarake saṃkucitakaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1418: yathā rājā rājñāṃ viṣaye vaśavartī viharati /
T06asmahsbu:1419: tathā kāmisthātṛsvaparajanakṛtyārtham udite viśeṣo vijñeyaḥ satatam adhimuktayā vividhayā /
T06asmahsbu:1420: mahāyāne tasya vidhivad iha matvā paramatāṃ bhṛśaṃ tasmin dhīraḥ satatam iha tām eva vṛṇuyāt // AMsa_10.10 //
T06asmahsbu:1421: api khalu kāminām adhimuktiḥ śvasadṛśī laukikasamādhigatānāṃ kūrmaprakhyā svārthavatāṃ bhṛtyopamā /
T06asmahsbu:1426: aprameyā yataḥ satvā layaṃ nāto 'dhivāsayet // AMsa_10.11 //
T06asmahsbu:1432: yathā puṇyaṃ prasavate pareṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadat /
T06asmahsbu:1433: na tu svayaṃ sa bhuñjānas tathā puṇyamahodayaḥ // AMsa_10.12 //
T06asmahsbu:1436: na tu svārthāśrayād dharmād deśitād upalabhyate // AMsa_10.13 //
T06asmahsbu:1437: yathā bhojanaṃ dadataḥ puṇyam utpadyate parārthādhikārāt /
T06asmahsbu:1439: evaṃ parārthāśrayadeśitāt mahāyānadharmāt teṣu teṣu sūtreṣūktaḥ puṇyodayo mahāṃl labhyate /
T06asmahsbu:1442: iti vipulagatau mahoghamahāryadharme janiya sadā matimān mahādhimuktim /
T06asmahsbu:1443: vipulasatatapuṇyatadvivṛddhiṃ vrajati guṇair asamair mahātmatāṃ ca // AMsa_10.14 //
T06asmahsbu:1445: vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme 'pariṇīyayodārādhimuktyā matimān trividhaṃ phalaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T06asmahsbu:1446: vipulapuṇyavṛddhiṃ tasyā evādhimukter vṛddhiṃ taddhetukāṃ cātulyaguṇamahātmatāṃ buddhatvaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1451: piṭakatrayaṃ dvayaṃ vā saṃgrahataḥ kāraṇair navabhir iṣṭam /
T06asmahsbu:1454: tad eva trayaṃ hīnayānāgrayānabhedena dvayaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:1456: tatpunas trayaṃ dvayaṃ vā kenārthena piṭakam ity āha /
T06asmahsbu:1459: navabhiḥ kāraṇair vicikitsāpratipakṣeṇa sūtraṃ yo yatrārthe saṃśayitas tasya tanniścayārthaṃ deśanāt /
T06asmahsbu:1462: (Msa 54) punaḥ śikṣātrayadeśanā sūtreṇa adhiśīlādhicittasaṃpādanatā vinayena śīlavato 'vipratisārādavipratisāreṇa samādhilābhāt /
T06asmahsbu:1476: teṣāṃ jñānād dhīmān sarvākārajñatām eti // AMsa_11.2 //
T06asmahsbu:1477: te ca sūtravinayābhidharmāḥ pratyekaṃ caturvidhārthāḥ samāsatas teṣāṃ jñānād bodhisatvaḥ sarvajñatāṃ prāpnoti /
T06asmahsbu:1478: śrāvakas tv ekasyā api gāthāyā artham ājñāyāsravakṣyaṃ prāpnoti /
T06asmahsbu:1479: āśrayato lakṣaṇato dharmād arthāc ca sūcanāt sūtram /
T06asmahsbu:1483: tatrāśrayo yatra deśe deśitaṃ yena yasmai ca /
T06asmahsbu:1487: abhimukhatvād abhīkṣṇatvād abhibhavanād abhigamanāc cābhidharmo veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1489: abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmo 'bhidharma ekaikasya dharmasya rūpyarūpisanidarśanādiprabhedena bahulanirdeśāt /
T06asmahsbu:1492: āpatter utthānād vyutthānān niḥsṛteś ca vinayatvam /
T06asmahsbu:1494: āpattitaḥ samutthānato vyutthānato niḥsaraṇataś ca veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1497: samutthānam āpattīnām ajñānāt pramādāt kleśaprācuryādanādarāc ca /
T06asmahsbu:1503: ajñānāt prasrabdhiḥ samagreṇa saṃghena śikṣāpadastha pratiprasrambhaṇāt /
T06asmahsbu:1509: prajñaptito yadā 'rocite pudgalāparādhe śāstā saṃnipātya saṃghaśikṣāṃ prajñāpayati /
T06asmahsbu:1510: pravibhāgato yaḥ prajñapte śikṣāpade tad uddeśasya vibhāgaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1511: viniścayataś ca tatrāpattiḥ kathaṃ bhavaty anāpattir veti nirdhāraṇāt /
T06asmahsbu:1513: ālambanaṃ mato dharmaḥ ādhyātmaṃ bāhyakaṃ dvayam /
T06asmahsbu:1514: lābho dvayor dvayārthena dvayoś cānupalambhataḥ // AMsa_11.5 //
T06asmahsbu:1516: tatra grāhakabhūtaṃ kāyādikamādhyātmikaṃ grāhyabhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ tayor eva tathatādvayaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1517: tatra dvayor ādhyātmikabāhyayor ālambanayor dvayārthena lābho yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1518: yadi grāhyārthād grāhakārtham abhinnaṃ paśyati grāhakārthāc ca grāhyārthaṃ dvayasya
T06asmahsbu:1519: punaḥ samastasyādhyātmikabāhyālambanasya tathatāyā lābhas tayor eva dvayor anupalambhād veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1521: arthakhyānasya jalpāc ca nāmni sthānāc ca cetasaḥ // AMsa_11.6 //
T06asmahsbu:1524: trividhālambanalābhaś ca pūrvoktas tat samāśritaḥ // AMsa_11.7 //
T06asmahsbu:1525: dharmālambanalābhaḥ punas tribhir jñānair bhavati śrutacintābhāvanāmayaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1526: tatra samāhitena cetasā manojalpair yathoktārthaprasannasya tatpradhāraṇāt /
T06asmahsbu:1527: śrutamayena jñānena tallābhaḥ manojalpair iti saṃkalpaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1531: yadi manojalpād evāyam arthaḥ khyātīti paśyati nānyan manojalpād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe /
T06asmahsbu:1532: cittasya nāmni sthānāt bhāvanāmayena jñānena tallābho veditavyo dvayānupalambhād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe /
T06asmahsbu:1533: ata eva ca sa pūrvoktas trividhālambanalābho dharmālambanalābhasaṃniśrito veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1540: pañcadhā saptadhā caiva parijñā pañcadhā 'sya ca // AMsa_11.10 //
T06asmahsbu:1544: yogināṃ hi manaskāra eṣa sarvātmako mataḥ // AMsa_11.12 //
T06asmahsbu:1557: jñānasaṃprayukto yo yogopaniṣad yogasahagataḥ sa punaryathākramaṃ śrutacintāmanyo bhāvanāmayaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:1559: vibhinnālambanaḥ saptavidho nāmālambanaḥ padālambano vyañjanālambanaḥ pudgalanairātmyālambano dharmanairātmyālambano rūpidharmālambano 'rūpidharmālambanaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:1562: parijñāniyato yaḥ parijñeye vastuni parijñeye 'rthe parijñāyāṃ parijñāphale tatpravedanāyāṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:1563: tatra parijñeyaṃ vastu duḥkhaṃ parijñeyo 'rthas tasyaivānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmatā /
T06asmahsbu:1568: tatra caturākārabhāvanaḥ pudgalanairātmyākārabhāvano dharmanairātmyākārabhāvano darśanākārabhāvano jñānākārabhāvanaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:1578: evaṃ vyavasāyākārabhāvano dharmāsaṃpramoṣākārabhāvanaś cittasthityākārabhāvanaḥ pravicayākārabhāvana indriyeṣu /
T06asmahsbu:1587: pratīcchako yo dharmasrotasi buddhabodhisatvānām antikād avavādagrāhakaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1590: vṛttyupalakṣaṇaprāyogiko yena dvividhāṃ vṛttim upalakṣayate parimāṇavṛttiṃ ca vyañjanānām aparimāṇavṛttiṃ ca nāmapadayoḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1591: parikalpopalakṣaṇaprāyogiko yena dvayam upādāya dvayaparikalpam upalakṣayate /
T06asmahsbu:1592: nāmaparikalpam upādāyārthaparikalpam arthaparikalpamupādāya nāmaparikalpam aparikalpam akṣaraṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1595: sa punar ekādaśavidho veditavya āgantukatvaprativedhataḥ saṃprakhyānanimittaprativedhato
T06asmahsbu:1601: tatvaṃ yat satataṃ dvayena rahitaṃ bhrānteś ca saṃniśrayaḥ śakyaṃ naiva ca sarvathābhilapituṃ yañ cāprapañcātmakam /
T06asmahsbu:1602: jñeyaṃ heyam atho viśodhyamamalaṃ yac ca prakṛtyā matam yasyākāśasuvarṇavārisadṛśī kleśād viśuddhirmatā // AMsa_11.13 //
T06asmahsbu:1603: satataṃ dvayena rahitaṃ tatvaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇenātyantamasatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1606: tatra prathamaṃ tatvaṃ parijñeyaṃ dvitīyaṃ praheyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ viśodhyaṃ cāgantukamalādviśuddhaṃ ca prakṛtyā yasya prakṛtyā viśuddhasyākāśasuvarṇavārisadṛśī kleśād viśuddhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1608: na cāgantukamalāpagamād eṣāṃ viśuddhir neṣyata iti /
T06asmahsbu:1609: na khalu jagati tasmād vidyate kiṃcid anyaj jagad api tad aśeṣaṃ tatra saṃmūḍhabuddhi /
T06asmahsbu:1610: katham ayam abhirūḍho lokamohaprakāro yadasadabhiniviṣṭaḥ satsamantād vihāya // AMsa_11.14 //
T06asmahsbu:1612: na khalu tasmād evaṃlakṣaṇād dharmadhātoḥ kiṃcit anyal loke vidyate dharmatāyā dharmasyābhinnatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1617: yathā māyā yantraparigṛhītaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādikaṃ tathābhūtaparikalpaḥ paratantraḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1618: yathā māyākṛtaṃ tasyāṃ māyāyāṃ hastyaśvasuvarṇādyākṛtis tadbhāvena pratibhāsitā tathā
T06asmahsbu:1619: tasminn abhūtaparikalpe dvayabhrāntirgrāhyagrāhakatvena pratibhāsitā parikalpitasvabhāvākārā veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:1620: yathā tasmin na tadbhāvaḥ paramārthas tatheṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:1621: yathā tasyopalabdhis tu tathā saṃvṛtisatyatā // AMsa_11.16 //
T06asmahsbu:1622: yathā tasmin na tadbhāvo māyākṛte hastitvādyabhāvas tathā tasmin paratantre paramārtha iṣyate parikalpitasya dvayalakṣaṇasyābhāvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1623: yathā tasya māyākṛtasya hastyādibhāvenopalabdhis tathābhūtaparikalpasya saṃvṛtisatyatopalabdhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1626: yathā māyākṛtyasyābhāve tasya nimittasya kāṣṭhādikasya vyaktir bhūtārthopalabhyate tathāśrayaparāvṛttau dvayabhrāntyabhāvād abhūtaparikalpasya bhūto 'rtha upalabhyate /
T06asmahsbu:1627: tannimitte yathā loko hy abhrāntaḥ kāmataś caret /
T06asmahsbu:1628: parāvṛttāv aparyas taḥ kāmacārī tathā patiḥ yatiḥ // AMsa_11.18 //
T06asmahsbu:1629: yathā tannimitte kāṣṭhādāv abhrānto lokaḥ kāmataś carati svatantras tathā 'śrayaparāvṛttvaparyasta āryaḥ kāmacārī bhavati svatantraḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1630: tadākṛtiś ca tatrāsti tadbhāvaś ca na vidyate /
T06asmahsbu:1634: na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:1636: na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo yas tadākṛtibhāvo nāsau na bhāvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1637: nābhāvo bhāva eva ca yo hastitvādyabhāvo nāsau na bhāvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1638: tayoś ca bhāvābhāvayor aviśeṣo māyādiṣu vidhīyate /
T06asmahsbu:1641: ya eva hastitvādyabhāvaḥ sa eva tadākṛtibhāvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1642: tathā dvayābhatātrāsti tadbhāvaś ca na vidyate /
T06asmahsbu:1646: na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:1653: ya eva hi ābhāsatāyā bhāvaḥ sa eva dvayasyābhāva iti /
T06asmahsbu:1655: hīnayānena yānasya pratiṣedhārtham eva ca // AMsa_11.23 //
T06asmahsbu:1656: kim arthaṃ punar ayaṃ bhāvābhāvayor aikāntikatvam aviśeṣaś ceṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:1660: abhāvasya hy abhāvatvaṃ viditvā samāropaṃ na karoti /
T06asmahsbu:1662: tayoś cāviśeṣaṃ viditvā na bhāvād udvijayate tasmān na hīnayānena niryāti /
T06asmahsbu:1663: bhrānter nimittaṃ bhrāntiś ca rūpavijñaptir iṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:1664: arūpiṇī ca vijñaptir abhāvāt syān na cetarā // AMsa_11.24 //
T06asmahsbu:1665: rūpabhrānter yā nimittavijñaptiḥ sā rūpavijñaptir iṣyate rūpākhyā /
T06asmahsbu:1667: abhāvād rūpāvijñapter itarāpi na syād arūpiṇī vijñaptiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1670: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate // AMsa_11.25 //
T06asmahsbu:1672: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate // AMsa_11.26 //
T06asmahsbu:1674: grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate /
T06asmahsbu:1675: pratibimbaṃ saṃkalikāṃ ca manasikurvataḥ tadgrāhabhrānter dvayam udāhṛtaṃ pūrvavat /
T06asmahsbu:1677: sadasanto 'tha māyābhā ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇāḥ // AMsa_11.27 //
T06asmahsbu:1678: ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇā vipakṣasvabhāvās te sadasanto māyopamāś ca /
T06asmahsbu:1682: tayoś ca bhāvābhāvayor aviśiṣṭatvāt santo 'pya santo 'pi māyāpi caivaṃlakṣaṇās tasmān māyopamāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1685: māyopamāś ca nirdiṣṭā ye dharmāḥ prātipakṣikāḥ // AMsa_11.28 //
T06asmahsbu:1686: ye 'pi prātipakṣikā dharmā buddhenopadiṣṭāḥ smṛtyupasthānādayas te 'pyalakṣaṇā māyāś ca nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1687: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā 'bhāvād yathā bālair gṛhyante /
T06asmahsbu:1690: evam alakṣaṇā avidyamānāś ca khyānti tasmān māyopamāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1692: ye sarvadharmān paśyanti nirmārās te jinātmajāḥ // AMsa_11.29 //
T06asmahsbu:1694: ye prātipakṣikā dharmās te māyārājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśaprahāṇe vyavadānādhipatyāt /
T06asmahsbu:1695: ye 'pi sāṃkleśikā dharmās te 'pi rājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśanirvṛttāv ādhipatyāt /
T06asmahsbu:1696: atas taiḥ prātipakṣikaiḥ saṃkleśaparājayo māyārājñeva rājñaḥ parājayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1697: tajjñānāc ca bodhisatvā nirmānāḥ] bhavanti ubhayapakṣe /
T06asmahsbu:1700: ṣaṭ ṣaṭ dvau ca punaś ca ṣaṭ dvayamatā ekaikaśaś ca trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ khalu tatra tatra kathitā buddhair vibuddhottamaiḥ // AMsa_11.30 //
T06asmahsbu:1701: yat tūktaṃ bhagavatā māyopamā dharmā yāvan nirmāṇopamā iti /
T06asmahsbu:1705: marīcikopamau dvau dharmo cittaṃ caitasikāś ca bhrāntikaratvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1706: pratibimbopamāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍ evādhyātmikāny āyatanāni pūrvakarmapratibimbatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1707: pratibhāsopamāḥ ṣaḍ eva bāhyāny āyatanāny ādhyātmikānām āyatanānāṃ chāyābhūtatvāt tadādhipatyotpattitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1710: udakacandrabimbopamāḥ samādhisaṃniśritā dharmāḥ samādher udakasthānīyatvād acchatayā /
T06asmahsbu:1713: abhūtakalpo na bhūto nābhūto 'kalpa eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:1714: na kalpo nāpi cākalpaḥ sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ nirucyate // AMsa_11.31 //
T06asmahsbu:1716: na bhūto nābhūto yas tadanukūlo yāvan nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1718: na kalpo (Msa 63) nāpi cākalpo lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1725: sahāvidyayā kleśaiś ca vṛttir eṣāṃ ta ime sāvidyākleśavṛttayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1729: ta eva hy advayābhāsā vartante carmakāṇḍavat // AMsa_11.33 //
T06asmahsbu:1730: ālambanaviśeṣāptir iti yo dharmālambanalābhaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1731: svadhātusthānayogata iti svadhātur vikalpānāṃ tathatā tatra sthānaṃ nāmni sthānāc cetasaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1733: bhāvanāmārgeṇa ta eva vikalpā advayābhāsā vartante parāvṛttāśrayasya /
T06asmahsbu:1735: yathā hi kharatvāpagamāt tad eva carma mṛdu bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:1736: agnisaṃtāpanayā tad eva kāṇḍaṃ ṛju bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:1737: evaṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanābhyāṃ cetaḥprajñāvimuktilābhe parāvṛttāśrayasya ta eva vikalpā na punar dvayābhāsāḥ pravartante ity eva vyavadānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1740: śraddhādyābhāsaṃ na tadanyo dharmaḥ kliṣṭakuśalo 'sti // AMsa_11.34 //
T06asmahsbu:1741: cittamātram eva dvayapratibhāsam iṣyate grāhyapratibhāsaṃ grāhakapratibhāsaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:1744: na tu tadābhāsād anyaḥ kliṣṭo dharmo 'sti rāgādilakṣaṇaḥ kuśalo vā śraddhādilakṣaṇaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1746: iti cittaṃ citrābhāsaṃ citrākāraṃ pravartate // AMsa_11.35 //
T06asmahsbu:1748: tatra cittam eva vastu tac citrābhāsaṃ (Msa 64)
T06asmahsbu:1750: paryāyeṇa rāgābhāsaṃ vā dveṣābhāsaṃ vā tadanyadharmābhāsaṃ vā /
T06asmahsbu:1753: na tu dharmāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ tatpratibhāsavyatirekeṇa tallakṣaṇābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1756: lakṣyaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ caiva lakṣaṇā ca prabhedataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1760: lakṣyam etat samāsena hy apramāṇaṃ prabhedataḥ // AMsa_11.37 //
T06asmahsbu:1764: avikāritā asaṃskṛtam ākāśādikaṃ tadvijñapter nityaṃ tathāpravṛtteḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1765: ity etat samāsena pañcavidhaṃ lakṣyaṃ prabhedenāpramāṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1769: tatra parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ yathājalpārthasaṃjñāyā nimittaṃ tasya jalpasya vāsanā tasmāc ca vāsanādyo 'rthaḥ khyāti avyavahārakuśalānāṃ vināpi yathājalpārthasaṃjñayā /
T06asmahsbu:1771: tasyā yad ālambanaṃ tannimittam evaṃ yac ca parikalpyate yataś ca kāraṇād vāsanatas tad ubhayaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇamatrābhipretaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1772: yathā nāmārtham arthasya nāmnaḥ prakhyānatā ca yā /
T06asmahsbu:1774: aparaparyāyo yathā nāma cārthaś ca yathānāmārtham arthasya nāmnaś ca prakhyānatā yathānāmārthaprakhyānatā /
T06asmahsbu:1775: yadi yathānāmārthaḥ khyāti yathārthaṃ vā nāma ity etad abhūtaparikalpālambanaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ etāvad dhi parikalpyate yad uta nāma vā artho veti /
T06asmahsbu:1790: pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ punas tathatā sā hy abhāvatā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ parikalpitā nābhāvatā ca tadabhāvatvena bhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1792: aśāntā cāgantukair upakleśaiḥ śāntā ca prakṛtipariśaddhatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1794: etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ kleśavyavadānalakṣaṇam avikalpalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:1797: cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ ca sadasattārthapaśyanā // AMsa_11.42 //
T06asmahsbu:1799: ādhāra ādhānam ādarśa āloka āśrayaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:1800: tatrādhāro niṣpandadharmo yo buddhenādhigamo deśitaḥ sa tasyādhigamasya niṣpandaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1802: ādarśaḥ cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ samādhir yad etat pūrvaṃ nāmni sthānam uktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1803: ālokaḥ sadasatvenārthadarśanaṃ lokottarā prajñā tathā sac ca sato yathābhūtaṃ paśyaty asaccāsataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1806: samaṃ viśiṣṭam anyūnānadhikaṃ lakṣaṇā matā // AMsa_11.43 //
T06asmahsbu:1816: na ca tasyonatvaṃ saṃkleśapakṣanirodhe nādhikatvaṃ vyavadānapakṣotpāda ity eṣā (Msa 66)
T06asmahsbu:1821: dhātur bījaparāvṛtteḥ sa ca sarvatragāśrayaḥ // AMsa_11.44 //
T06asmahsbu:1823: padārthadehanirbhāsānāṃ vijñānānāṃ parāvṛttir anāsravo dhātur vimuktiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1825: caturdhā vaśitā vṛtter manasaś codgrahaś ca ca /
T06asmahsbu:1826: vikalpasyāvikalpe hi kṣetre jñāne 'tha karmaṇi // AMsa_11.45 //
T06asmahsbu:1827: manasaś codgrahasya ca vikalpasya cāvṛtteḥ parāvṛtter ity arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1828: caturdhā vaśitā bhavati yathākramam avikalpe kṣetre jñānakarmaṇoś ca /
T06asmahsbu:1830: dvidhaikasyāṃ tadanyasyām ekaikā vaśitā matā // AMsa_11.46 //
T06asmahsbu:1831: sā ceyam acalādibhūmitraye caturdhā vaśitā veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:1835: tadanyasyāṃ bhūmāv ekaikā vaśitā sādhumatyaṃ jñānavaśitā pratisaṃvidviśeṣalābhāt /
T06asmahsbu:1837: viditvā nairātmyaṃ dvividham iha dhīmān bhavagataṃ samaṃ tac ca jñātvā praviśati sa tatvaṃ grahaṇataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1838: tatas tatra sthānān manasa iha na khyāti tad api tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya vigamaḥ // AMsa_11.47 //
T06asmahsbu:1840: dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ viditvā bhavatrayagataṃ bodhisatvaḥ samaṃ tac ca jñātvā dvividhinair ātmyaṃ parikalpitapudgalābhāvāt parikalpitadharmābhāvāt na tu sarvathaivābhāvataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1841: tatvaṃ praviśati vijñaptimātratāṃ grahaṇato grahaṇamātram etad iti /
T06asmahsbu:1842: tatas tatra tatvavijñaptimātrasthānān manasas tad api tatvaṃ na khyāti (Msa 67)
T06asmahsbu:1844: tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya yo vigamaḥ pudgaladharmayor anupalambhāt /
T06asmahsbu:1845: ādhāre saṃbhārād ādhāne sati hi nāmamātraṃ paśyan /
T06asmahsbu:1846: paśyati hi nāmamātraṃ tatpaśyaṃs tac ca naiva paśyati bhūyaḥ // AMsa_11.48 //
T06asmahsbu:1848: ādhāra iti śrutau saṃbhārād iti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārasya pūrvasaṃbhāralābhāt /
T06asmahsbu:1849: ādhāne satīti yoniśomanaskāre nāmamātraṃ paśyann ity abhilāpamātram artharahitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1850: paśyati hi nāmamātram iti vijñaptimātraṃ nāma arūpiṇaś catvāraḥ skandhā iti kṛtvā
T06asmahsbu:1851: tatpaśyaṃs tad api bhūyo naiva paśyaty arthabhāve tadvijñaptyadarśanād ity ayam anupalambho vimuktiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1853: pravartate nivṛttis tu tad adhyātmasthiter matā // AMsa_11.49 //
T06asmahsbu:1854: aparaprakāraś cittam etat sadauṣṭhulyaṃ pravartate janmasu /
T06asmahsbu:1857: nivṛttis tu tad adhyātmasthiter iti tasya cittasya citta evāvasthānād ālambanānupalambhataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1863: svabhāva 'navasthitatvān niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ kṣaṇikatvād ity etattrividhaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatrayānugaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:1864: grāhavat tadabhāvāc ca niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ tadabhāvād iti svābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:1865: yathā bālānāṃ svabhāvagrāho nityasukhaśacyāt to vā 'nyena vā parikalpitalakṣaṇena tathāsau svabhāvo nāsti tasmād api niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ dharmāṇām iṣyate / ....
T06asmahsbu:1870: yo hi niḥsvabhāvaḥ so 'nutpanno yo 'nutpannaḥ so 'niruddho yo 'niruddhaḥ sa ādiśānto
T06asmahsbu:1871: ya ādiśāntaḥ sa prakṛtiparinirvṛta ity evam uttarottaraniśrayair ebhir niḥsvabhāvatābhir
T06asmahsbu:1877: ādau saṃsārasya na hi tasyādyutpattir asti /
T06asmahsbu:1878: tatve 'nyatve ca pūrvapaścimānāṃ na hi saṃsāre teṣām eva dharmāṇām utpattirye pūrvam utpannās tadbhāvenānutpatteḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1880: svalakṣaṇe parikalpitasya svabhāvasya na hi tasya kadācid utpattiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:1882: anyathābhāve pariniṣpannasya na hi tadanyathā bhāvasyotpattir asti /
