T06asmahsbu:2346: ye buddhabodhisatveṣv akāraṃ kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantīti /
T06asmahsbu:2349: kṛtsnadhātupuṣṭiḥ sarvamahāyānādhiṣṭhānāya dhātupuṣṭis tadāvaraṇavigamāt sarvatra mahāyāne 'dhimuktilābhataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2351: dṛṣṭe dharme dvividho 'nuśaṃsaḥ sāṃparāyike 'ṣṭavidhaḥ krameṇottarāuttaraviśeṣalābhād veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2353: iti sugatirakhedavān kṛpāluḥ prathitayaśāḥ suvidhijñatām upetaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2354: bhavati sukathiko hi bodhisatvas tapati jane kathitair yathaiva sūryaḥ // AMsa_12.24 //
T06asmahsbu:2358: pañca kāraṇāni sukathikatvasya yenāviparītaṃ darśayati abhīkṣṇaṃ nirāmiṣacitta ādeyavākyavineyānurūpaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:2365: yathārtham ājñāya dharmamājñāya dharmānudharmapratipanno bhavati sāmīcīpratipanno 'nudharmacārī tatsaṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:2370: (Msa 85) etat samādhitrayaṃ laukikaṃ na mithyātvaṃ lokottarajñānāvāhanāt /
T06asmahsbu:2374: evam arthajñaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sūtrādīnāṃ kolopamatāṃ jānāti /
T06asmahsbu:2378: etena dvividhena pārthagjanenārthadharmajñānena dvayaṃ nairātmyabhāvaṃ pratividhya yathākramaṃ tasya jñānasya pariniṣpattyarthaṃ pratipadyate
T06asmahsbu:2381: ādibhūmau samaṃ sarvair bodhisatvais tadātmabhiḥ // AMsa_13.4 //
T06asmahsbu:2382: tato jñānaṃ sa labhate lokottaramanuttaram iti /
T06asmahsbu:2384: ādibhūmau pramuditāyāṃ bhūmau samaṃ sarvair bodhisatvais tadātmabhir iti tadbhūmikair evaṃ sāmīcīpratipanno bhavati tadbhūmikabodhisatvasamatayā
T06asmahsbu:2389: anudharmaṃ caraty evaṃ pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu // AMsa_13.6 //
T06asmahsbu:2396: suyogo guṇavān deśo yatra dhīmān prapadyate // AMsa_13.7 //
T06asmahsbu:2405: akhinno bodhisatvaś ca jñeyaḥ satpurūṣo mahān // AMsa_13.8 //
T06asmahsbu:2411: saddharmālambanatayā susaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratayā śamathādinimittānāṃ kālena kālaṃ bhāvanātayā alpamātrāsaṃtuṣṭitayā satyuttarakaraṇīye sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā ca /
T06asmahsbu:2413: samādher vicayasyāpi pūrve hi kṛtapuṇyatā // AMsa_13.10 //
T06asmahsbu:2414: anena caturthena pūrvakṛtapuṇyatāṃ pañcavidhena hetutvena darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:2417: ārogyasamādhiprajñāhetutvena ca yata ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ saṃpadyate /
T06asmahsbu:2420: tasmād rāgādayas teṣāṃ buddhair niḥsaraṇaṃ matāḥ // AMsa_13.11 //
T06asmahsbu:2422: nāham anyatra rāgād rāgasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmy evaṃ dveṣān mohād iti /
T06asmahsbu:2424: yasmād dharmadhātuvinirmukto dharmo nāsti dharmatāvyatirekeṇa dharmābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:2425: tasmād rāgādidharmatāpi rāgādyākhyāṃ labhate sa ca niḥsaraṇaṃ rāgādīnām ity evaṃ tatrābhisaṃdhir veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2427: tasmāt saṃkleśanirdeśe sa saṃvid dhīmatāṃ mataḥ // AMsa_13.12 //
T06asmahsbu:2428: yad uktaṃ / avidyā ca bodhiś caikam iti /
T06asmahsbu:2431: yatas tān eva rāgādīn yoniśaḥ pratipadyate /
T06asmahsbu:2432: tato vimucyate tebhyas tenaiṣāṃ niḥsṛtis tataḥ // AMsa_13.13 //
T06asmahsbu:2433: tān eva rāgādīn yoniśaḥ pratipadyamānas tebhyo vimucyate tasmāt parijñātās ta eva teṣāṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhavatīty ayam atrābhisaṃdhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2435: na khalu jinasutānāṃ bādhakaṃ duḥkhamugraṃ narakabhavanavāsaiḥ satvahetoḥ kathaṃcit /
T06asmahsbu:2436: śamabhavaguṇadoṣapreritā hīnayāne vividhaśubhavikalpā bādhakā dhīmatāṃ tu // AMsa_13.14 //
T06asmahsbu:2437: na khalu narakavāso dhīmatāṃ sarvakālaṃ vimalavipulabodherantarāyaṃ karoti /
T06asmahsbu:2438: svahitaparamaśītas tvanyayāne vikalpaḥ paramasukhavihāre 'pyantarāyaṃ karoti // AMsa_13.15 //
T06asmahsbu:2445: yathaiva citre vidhivadvicitrite natonnataṃ nasti ca dṛśyate 'tha ca /
T06asmahsbu:2446: abhūtakalpe 'pi tathaiva sarvathā dvayaṃ sadā nasti ca dṛśyate 'the ca // AMsa_13.17 //
T06asmahsbu:2447: yathaiva toye lutiṭite prasādite na jāyate sā punar acchatānyataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2448: malāpakarṣas tu sa tatra kevalaḥ svacittaśuddhau vidhir eṣa eva hi // AMsa_13.18 //
T06asmahsbu:2449: mataṃ ca cittaṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ sadā tadāgantukadoṣadūṣitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2450: na dharmatācittamṛte 'nyacetasaḥ prabhāsvaratvaṃ prakṛtau vidhīyate // AMsa_13.19 //
T06asmahsbu:2451: dharmābhāvaś ca dharmopalabdhiś ceti trāsasthānaṃ niḥsaṃkleśatā ca dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyā viśuddhatā ca paścād iti trāsasthānaṃ bālānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2452: tadyathākramaṃ māyādisādṛśyenākāśasādṛśyena ca prasādhayaṃs tatas trāsaṃ pratiṣedhayati /
T06asmahsbu:2453: tathā citre natonnatasādṛśyena lutitaprasāditatoyasādṛśyena ca yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2455: yathā toyaṃ prakṛtyā prasannam āgantukena tu kāluṣyeṇa lutitaṃ bhavaty evaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaraṃ matam āgantukais tu doṣair dūṣitam iti /
T06asmahsbu:2456: na ca dharmatācittād ṛte 'nyasya cetasaḥ paratantralakṣaṇasya prakṛtiprabhāsvaratvaṃ vidhīyate /
T06asmahsbu:2460: yathaikaputrake tasmāt sadā hitakaraṃ matam // AMsa_13.20 //
T06asmahsbu:2461: satveṣu hitakāritvān naity āpattiṃ sa rāgajāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2462: dveṣo virudyate tvasya sarvasatveṣu satpathā // AMsa_13.21 //
T06asmahsbu:2463: yathā kapotī svasutātivatsalā svabhāvakāṃs tān upaguhya tiṣṭhati /
T06asmahsbu:2464: tathāvidhāyaṃ pratigho virudhyate suteṣu tadvat sakṛpe 'pi dehiṣu // AMsa_13.22 //
T06asmahsbu:2465: maitrī yataḥ pratighacittam ato viruddhaṃ śāntir yato vyasanacittam ato viruddhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2467: artho yato nikṛticittam ato viruddhaṃ lhādo yataḥ pratibhayaṃ na ca tato viruddhaṃ // AMsa_13.23 //
T06asmahsbu:2468: yat satveṣu bodhisatvasya prema so 'ca rāgo 'bhipretas tatkṛtām āpattiṃ teṣāṃ pratiṣedhayati /
T06asmahsbu:2470: kapotīm udāharati tadbahurāgatvāt apatyasnehādhimātratayā sakṛpe bodhisatve dehiṣu satveṣu pratigho virudhyate /
T06asmahsbu:2471: bodhisatvānāṃ satveṣu maitrī bhavati vyasanaśāntiḥ arthadānaṃ hlādaś ca prītyutpādāt /
T06asmahsbu:2472: yata ime maitryādayas tata eva pratighacittaṃ viruddhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2476: āture ca yathā vaidyaḥ satveṣu pratipadyate // AMsa_13.24 //
T06asmahsbu:2478: vaṇigyathā punaḥ puṇye kāmeṣu pratipadyate // AMsa_13.25 //
T06asmahsbu:2480: pitā yathā sute bāle satvāheṭhe prapadyate // AMsa_13.26 //
T06asmahsbu:2484: pratipattiryathā yasmin bodhisatvasya sā matā // AMsa_13.28 //
T06asmahsbu:2498: paramavimalanirvikalpabuddhyā vrajati sa siddhim anuttamāṃ krameṇa // AMsa_13.29 //
T06asmahsbu:2500: iti nirvikalpena dharmanairātmyajñānena pratipattuḥ pratipattavyasya pratipatteś cāvikalpanā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhir veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:2501: dvayaparipācanaśodhaneṣu yukta iti satvānām ātmanaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:2507: saṃpūrṇaḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ sāgaro vāribhiryathā // AMsa_14.1 //
T06asmahsbu:2511: suvijñaḥ kalpacittaś ca bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate // AMsa_14.2 //
T06asmahsbu:2519: sūtrādināmni bandhīyāc cittaṃ prathamato yatiḥ // AMsa_14.4 //
T06asmahsbu:2521: vicārayet tadarthāṃś ca pratyātmayoniśaś ca saḥ // AMsa_14.5 //
T06asmahsbu:2522: avadhṛtya ca tān arthān dharme saṃkalayet punaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2523: tataḥ kuryāt samāśastiṃ tadarthādhigamāya saḥ // AMsa_14.6 //
T06asmahsbu:2525: sūtrageyādike dharme yatsūtrādināma daśabhūmikam ity evamādi tatra cittaṃ prathamato badhnīyāt /
T06asmahsbu:2526: ebhis tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ ṣaṭ cittāny upadiṣṭāni /
T06asmahsbu:2527: mūlacittam anucaracittaṃ vicāraṇācittam avadhāraṇācittaṃ saṃkalanacittam āśāsticittaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:2530: tadyathā 'nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmyaṃ ca yoniśo na cety ādi /
T06asmahsbu:2531: anucaracittaṃ yena sūtrādīnāṃ nāmata ālambitānāṃ padaprabhedam anugacchati /
T06asmahsbu:2533: tatrārthaṃ caturbhir ākārair vicārayati gaṇanayā tulanayā mīmāṃsayā pratyavekṣaṇayā ca /
T06asmahsbu:2534: tatra gaṇanā saṃgrahaṇaṃ tadyathā rūpaṃ daśāyatanāny ekasya ca pradeśo vedanā ṣaḍ vedanākāyā ity evam ādi /
T06asmahsbu:2535: tulanā saṃkhyāvato dharmasya śamalakṣagrahaṇam anādhyāropān apavādataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2540: sārthatathā ca samastānāṃ vyañjanānāṃ nirarthatayā ca vyastānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2541: avadhāraṇācittaṃ yena yathānucaritaṃ vicāritaṃ vā tannimittam avadhārayati /
T06asmahsbu:2542: saṃkalanacittaṃ tadyathā vicāritam arthaṃ mūlacitte saṃkṣipya paripiṇḍitākāraṃ vartate /
T06asmahsbu:2543: āśāsticittaṃ yadarthaṃ prayukto bhavati samā tatparipūryarthaṃ vā śrāmaṇyaphalārthaṃ vā bhūmipraveśārthaṃ vā viśeṣagamanārthaṃ vā tacchandasahagataṃ vartate /
T06asmahsbu:2544: cittam eva hy ālambanapratibhāsaṃ vartate na cittād anyad ālambanam astīti jānato vā cittamātram ajānato vā cittam evālambanaṃ nānyat /
T06asmahsbu:2550: yuganaddhaś ca vijñeyo mārgas tatpiṇḍitaṃ punaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2551: līnaṃ cittasya gṛhṇīyād uddhataṃ śamayet punaḥ // AMsa_14.9 //
T06asmahsbu:2553: sātatyenātha satkṛtya sarvasmin yojayet punaḥ // AMsa_14.10 //
T06asmahsbu:2554: ebhiś caturbhiḥ ślokair ekādaśa manaskārā upadiṣṭāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2566: avagamyāśu vikṣepaṃ tasmin pratiharet punaḥ // AMsa_14.11 //
T06asmahsbu:2567: pratyātmaṃ saṃkṣipec cittam upary upari buddhimān /
T06asmahsbu:2568: tataś ca ramayec cittaṃ samādhau guṇadarśanāt // AMsa_14.12 //
T06asmahsbu:2570: abhidhyā daurmanasyādīn vyutthitān śamayet tathā // AMsa_14.13 //
T06asmahsbu:2573: ebhiś caturbhiḥ ślokair navākārayā cittasthityā sthityupāya upadiṣṭaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2574: cittaṃ sthāpayati saṃsthāpayati avasthāpayati upasthāpayati damayati śamayati vyupaśamayaty ekotīkaroti cittaṃ samādadhātīti navākārāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2575: tataḥ sa tanukāṃ labdhvā praśrabdhiṃ kāyacetasoḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2576: vijñeyaḥ samanaskāraḥ punas tāns tāṃ sa vivardhayan // AMsa_14.15 //
T06asmahsbu:2578: tāṃ śodhayann abhijñārtham eti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ // AMsa_14.16 //
T06asmahsbu:2580: pūjārtham aprameyāṇāṃ buddhāyāṃ śravaṇāya ca // AMsa_14.17 //
T06asmahsbu:2582: karmaṇyatāṃ parām eti cetasas tadupāsanāt // AMsa_14.18 //
T06asmahsbu:2583: eti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ dhyāne iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2586: tato 'nuśaṃsān labhate pañca śuddhaiḥ sa pūrvagān /
T06asmahsbu:2587: viśuddhibhājanatvaṃ ca tato yāti niruttaraṃ // AMsa_14.19 //
T06asmahsbu:2588: kṛtsnādau svalpadauṣṭhulya kāyo hi dravate 'sya pratikṣaṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2589: āpūryate ca praśrabdhyā kāyacittaṃ samantataḥ // AMsa_14.20 //
T06asmahsbu:2592: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasya sarvathā /
T06asmahsbu:2593: karoti satataṃ dhīmān evaṃ hetuparigrahaṃ // AMsa_14.22 //
T06asmahsbu:2599: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasyeti daśamyāṃ bhūmau paripūri rbuddhabhūmau viśuddhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2600: eteṣāṃ pañcānām anuśaṃsānāṃ trayaḥ śamathapakṣā dvau vipaśyanāpakṣau veditavyau /
T06asmahsbu:2603: manojalpād vinirmuktān sarvārthān na prapaśyati // AMsa_14.23 //
T06asmahsbu:2607: prahīno grāhyanivikṣepas tadā tasya bhavaty asau // AMsa_14.25 //
T06asmahsbu:2609: ānantaryasamādhiṃ ca spṛśaty āśu tadā punaḥ // AMsa_14.26 //
T06asmahsbu:2611: tathābhūto bodhisatvaḥ samāhitacitto manojalpād vinirmuktān sarvadharmān na paśyati svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇākhyān manojalpamātram eva khyāti
T06asmahsbu:2613: ayaṃ sa āloko yam adhikṛtyoktaṃ kṣāranadyām /
T06asmahsbu:2614: āloka iti dharmanidhyānakṣānter etad adhivacanam iti /
T06asmahsbu:2615: sa tasyaiva dharmālokasya vivṛddhyartham āsthitakriyayā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārabhate /
T06asmahsbu:2627: jñeyāny uṣmagatādīni etāni hi yathākramaṃ // AMsa_14.27 //
T06asmahsbu:2630: nirvikalpaṃ malāpetaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhate punaḥ // AMsa_14.28 //
T06asmahsbu:2637: etena virajo vigatamalam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:2639: ameyaiś cāsya sā kalpaiḥ suviśuddhiṃ nigacchati // AMsa_14.29 //
T06asmahsbu:2641: dharmadhātoś ca samatāṃ pratividhya punas tadā /
T06asmahsbu:2645: dharmanairātmyena ca dharmasamatāṃ pratividhya sarvasatveṣu sadā ātmasamacittatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06asmahsbu:2651: tadanyabodhisatvasamatayā ca yathā tair abhisamitaṃ tathābhisamayāt /
T06asmahsbu:2657: labdhvā darśanamārgo hi tadā tena nirūcyate // AMsa_14.33 //
T06asmahsbu:2658: tasya grāhyagrāhakābhāvasya bhāvaṃ dharmadhātūn darśanaprahātavyaiḥ kleśair vimuktaṃ paśyati /
T06asmahsbu:2660: prakṛtyā śūnyatāṃ jñātvā śūnyajña iti kathyate // AMsa_14.34 //
T06asmahsbu:2662: sa ca bodhisatvaḥ śūnyajña ity ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:2665: tathā bhāvasya śūnyatā paratantrasya sa hi na tathābhāvo yathā kalpyate svena lakṣaṇena bhāvaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2670: abhūtaparikalpas tadapraṇidhānasya padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2671: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha lābhaḥ sadā mataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2673: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha bodhisatvasya sarveṣāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābho veditavyaḥ smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2674: saṃskāramātraṃ jagad etya buddhyā nirātmakaṃ duḥkhivirūḍhimātraṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2675: vihāya yānarthamayātmadṛṣṭiḥ mahātmadṛṣṭiṃ śrayate mahārthāṃ // AMsa_14.37 //
T06asmahsbu:2676: vinātmadṛṣṭyā ya ihātmadṛṣṭir vināpi duḥkhena suduḥkhitaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:2677: sarvārthakartā na ca kārakāṅkṣī yathātmanaḥ svātmahitāni kṛtvā // AMsa_14.38 //
T06asmahsbu:2678: yo muktacittaḥ parayā vimuktyā baddhaś ca gāḍhāyatabandhanena /
T06asmahsbu:2679: duḥkhasya paryantam apaśyamānaḥ prayujyate caiva karoti caiva // AMsa_14.39 //
T06asmahsbu:2680: svaṃ duḥkham udvoḍhum ihāsamartho lokaḥ kutaḥ piṇḍitam anyaduḥkhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2681: janmaikam ālokayate gataṃ tvacinto viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ // AMsa_14.40 //
T06asmahsbu:2682: yatprema yā vatsalatā prayogaḥ satveṣv akhedaś ca jinātmajānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2683: āścaryam etat paramaṃ bhaveṣu na caiva satvātmasamān abhāvāt // AMsa_14.41 //
T06asmahsbu:2684: ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ślokair darśanamārgalābhino bodhisatvasya māhātmyodbhāvanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2686: mahātmadṛṣṭir iti mahārthā yā sarvasatveṣv ātmasamacittalābhātmadṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2688: vinātmadṛṣṭyā anarthamayyātmadṛṣṭir mahārthā yā vināpi duḥkhena svasaṃtānajena suduḥkhitā sarvasatvasaṃtānajena /
T06asmahsbu:2689: yo vimuktacitto darśanaprahātavyebhyaḥ parayā vimuktyānuttareṇa yānena /
T06asmahsbu:2691: duḥkhasya paryantaṃ na paśyati svadhātor anantatvād ākāśavat prayujyate ca duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai satvānāṃ karoti caiva tām aprameyāṇāṃ satvānāṃ
T06asmahsbu:2692: viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ sa hi saṃpiṇḍitasarvasatvaduḥkhaṃ yāval lokagatam udvoḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2693: yā satveṣu bodhisatvasya priyatā yā ca hitasukhaiṣitā yaś ca tadarthaṃ prayogo yaś cittaprayuktasyākheda etat sarvam āścaryaṃ paramaṃ lokeṣu
T06asmahsbu:2704: yatra sthaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate // AMsa_14.46 //
T06asmahsbu:2708: yathāvyavasthānaṃ ca lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ yena satvān paripācayati /
T06asmahsbu:2709: asaṃkhyeyadvayasya samāptau paścimāṃ bhāvanām āgamyāvasānagatām abhiṣikto vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ labhate /
T06asmahsbu:2712: sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuttarapadaṃ yatrastho yāvat saṃsāram abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanādibhiḥ satvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate /
T06asmahsbu:2713: kathaṃ tathā durlabhadarśane munau bhaven mahārthaṃ na hi nityadarśanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:2714: bhṛśaṃ samāpyāyitacetasaḥ sadā prasādavegair asamaśravodbhavaiḥ // AMsa_14.47 //
T06asmahsbu:2715: apracodyamānaḥ satataṃ ca saṃmukhaṃ tathāgatair dharmasumukhe vyavasthitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2716: nigṛhya keśeṣv iva doṣagahvarāt nikṛṣya bodhau sa balān niveśyate // AMsa_14.48 //

T06asmahsbu:2726: dharmān sarvaprakārān vidhivad iha jinā darśayanty agrasatve yān varjyāsevya yoge bhavati vipulatā saugate śāsane 'smim // AMsa_14.50 //
T06asmahsbu:2729: adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ cādhikṛtya sthitivicayapare tadantarāyāṇāṃ tadanukūlānāṃ ca sarvaprakārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ deśanataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2730: yān varjyāsevyety antarāyān anukūlāṃś ca yathākramaṃ /

T06asmahsbu:2824: dvidhety adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣā sā antena dvayena saṃgṛhītā yathākramaṃ dhyānena prajñayā ca /

T06asmahsbu:2856: hīnaṃ hi dānam utkṛṣṭaṃ śīlam evaṃ yāvad dhīnaṃ dhyānam utkṛṣṭā prajñeti /
T06asmahsbu:2858: audārikaṃ hi dānaṃ supraveśatvāt sukaratvāc ca /

T06asmahsbu:2896: na tv eva te satvās tena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
T06asmahsbu:2897: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:2898: upakārakatarāṃś ca sa bodhisatvas tān satvān ātmanaḥ samanupaśyati /
T06asmahsbu:2902: na ca bodhisatvaḥ satveṣu tathā vipulam api dānamayaṃ puṇyam abhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā artho bhavati vipākena vā iti /

T06asmahsbu:2912: etena paryāyeṇa yāvāṃś chīlaskandho yāvān ca prajñāsakandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim

T06asmahsbu:2917: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /

T06asmahsbu:3101: tyaktaṃ buddhasutaiḥ svajīvitam api prāpyārthinaṃ sarvadā kāruṇyāt parato na ca pratikṛtir neṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prārthitaṃ /

T06asmahsbu:3113: kṣāntyānuttarayā ca sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā kṣāntir jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayā sthāpitā // AMsa_16.38 //
T06asmahsbu:3114: iti / kṣāntyānuttarayā caiti duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntyā ca parāpakāramarṣaṇakṣāntyā ca yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3115: vīryaṃ buddhasutaiḥ kṛtaṃ nirūpamaṃ saṃnāhayogātmakaṃ hantuṃ kleśagaṇaṃ svato 'pi parataḥ prāptuṃ ca bodhiṃ parāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3116: vīryeṇaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā vīryaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.39 //
T06asmahsbu:3119: dhyānaṃ buddhasutaiḥ samādhibahulaṃ saṃpāditaṃ sarvathā śreṣṭhair dhyānasukhair vihṛtya kṛpayā hīnāpapattiḥ śritā /
T06asmahsbu:3120: dhyānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dhyānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.40 //
T06asmahsbu:3122: jñātaṃ buddhasutaiḥ satatvam akhilaṃ jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathā saktir naiva ca nirvṛtau prajanitā buddhaiḥ kutaḥ saṃvṛtau /
T06asmahsbu:3123: jñānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā jñānaṃ satvaparigraheṇa punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.41 //
T06asmahsbu:3125: jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathety anantasvasaṃketādilakṣaṇabhedabhinnaṃ yad ajñeyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3127: jñānasya punaḥ satvaparigraheṇa karuṇayā satvānām aparityāgāt /
T06asmahsbu:3128: eṣāṃ punaḥ ṣaṇāṃ ślokānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ saptamena ślokena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3130: dānādīnāṃ samas taṃ hi jñeyaṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam // AMsa_16.42 //
T06asmahsbu:3131: iti / tatra dānādīnāṃ prathamena pādenodāratā paridīpitā /
T06asmahsbu:3134: caturthenākṣayatā ity eṣāṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam ebhiḥ ślokair veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3136: abhibhavati sa tāṃ dātā kṛpālurādhikyayogena // AMsa_16.43 //
T06asmahsbu:3137: yācanake hi jane dāyakadarśanāt tataś ca yathā-īpsitaṃ labdhvā manorathaparipūraṇādyā tuṣṭir utpadyate /
T06asmahsbu:3139: āśāstiś ca yā taddarśane manorathaparipūraṇe ca /
T06asmahsbu:3143: ato dātā kṛpālus tāṃ sarvam abhibhavaty ādhikyayogāt /
T06asmahsbu:3145: āmodate nikāmaṃ tadviratiṃ pālayātra katham // AMsa_16.44 //
T06asmahsbu:3149: mithyāvādaṃ brūyāt paropaghātāya katham āryaḥ // AMsa_16.45 //
T06asmahsbu:3162: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu samaṃ hitakāmaḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ mitrabhedārthaṃ paiśunyaṃ kariṣyatīti /
T06asmahsbu:3164: paraduḥkhotpādane cātyarthaṃ bhīruḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhotpādanārthaṃ paruṣaṃ vakṣyati /
T06asmahsbu:3165: satvānāṃ vinaye samyakprayuktaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ kariṣyati tasmād asau suvidūre trividhavāgdoṣāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpāc ca /
T06asmahsbu:3167: adhivāsayet katham asau sarvākāraṃ manaḥ kleśam // AMsa_16.47 //
T06asmahsbu:3170: upakarasaṃjñāmodaṃ hy apakāriṇiparahita saṃjñāṃparahite sadā duḥkhe /
T06asmahsbu:3171: labhate yadā kṛpāluḥ kṣamitavyaṃ tasya kiṃ na syāt // AMsa_16.48 //
T06asmahsbu:3175: duṣkaracaraṇāt sakṛpe hy aduṣkaraṃ vīryaṃ // AMsa_16.49 //
T06asmahsbu:3177: tatra sakṛpe yat parārthaṃ duṣkaracaraṇād vīrthaṃ tadaduṣkaraṃ ca suduṣkaraṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:3182: yad evaṃ parasaṃjñāpagataṃ ca svatodhikatarasnehaṃ ca tadvīryaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3183: alpasukhaṃ hy ātmasukhaṃ līnaṃ parihāṇikaṃ kṣayi samohaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3184: dhyānaṃ mataṃ trayāṇāṃ viparyayād bodhisatvānām // AMsa_16.50 //
T06asmahsbu:3186: līnaṃ laukikānāṃ satkāye śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca nirvāṇe /
T06asmahsbu:3187: parihāṇikaṃ laukikānāṃ kṣayi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe tatkṣayāt /
T06asmahsbu:3189: bodhisatvānāṃ punar dhyānaṃ bahusukham ātmaparasukham alīnamaparihāṇikam akṣayyasamohaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:3190: āmoṣais tamasi yathā dīpair nunnaṃ tathā trayajñānaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3192: yathā hastāmoṣais tamasi jñānaṃ parīttaviṣayamapratyakṣam avyaktaṃ ca tathā pṛthagjanānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3193: yathāvacarake dīpairjñānaṃ prādeśikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nātinirmalaṃ tathā śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:3194: yathā dinakarakiraṇair jñānaṃ samantāt pratyakṣaṃ sunirmalaṃ ca tathā bodhisatvānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3197: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.52 //
T06asmahsbu:3206: jñānaṃ nirvikalpaṃ yena trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dātṛdeyapratigrāhakāvikalpanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3208: arthī duḥkhito niḥpratisaraṇo duścaritacārī guṇavāṃś ca /
T06asmahsbu:3215: samādhir ādir yathā tatraiva vibhutvam uktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3218: yaś ca dadāti yac ca yena ca yasmai ca yataś ca yasya ca parigraheṇa yatra ca yāvat prakāraṃ tad dānaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3220: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.53 //
T06asmahsbu:3222: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.54 //
T06asmahsbu:3224: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.55 //
T06asmahsbu:3226: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca parā matā // AMsa_16.56 //
T06asmahsbu:3235: priyaṃ syād bodhisatvānāṃ prāg eva tadviparyayāt // AMsa_16.57 //
T06asmahsbu:3236: yadi bodhisatvānāṃ dānam ekasyaiva satvasya sukhadaṃ syād ātmanaś ca bahukalpavighātakṛt /
T06asmahsbu:3237: tathāpi tat teṣāṃ priyaṃ syāt karuṇāviśeṣāt kiṃ punar yad anekasatvasukhaṃ ca bhavatyā tmanaś ca bahukalpānugrahakṛt /
T06asmahsbu:3238: yad artham icchanti dhanāni dehinas tadeva dhīrā visṛjanti dehiṣu /
T06asmahsbu:3239: śarīrahetor dhanam iṣyate janais tad eva dhīraiḥ śataśo visṛjyate // AMsa_16.58 //
T06asmahsbu:3242: śarīram evotsṛjato na duḥkhyate yadā manaḥ kā draviṇe 'vare kathā /
T06asmahsbu:3243: tadasya lokottaram iti yan mudaṃ sa tena tat tasya tad uttaraṃ punaḥ // AMsa_16.59 //
T06asmahsbu:3244: atra śarīram evāutsṛjato yadā mano na duḥkhyate tadasya lokottaram iti saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3245: eti yan mudaṃ sa tena duḥkhena tat tasya taduttaram iti tasmāl lokottarād uttaraṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3247: sarvastidānena yatheha dhīmān tuṣṭiṃ vrajaty arthijanasya tuṣṭyā // AMsa_16.60 //
T06asmahsbu:3250: saṃpūrṇabhogo na tathāstimantam ātmānam anvīkṣati yācako 'pi /
T06asmahsbu:3251: sarvastidānād adhano 'pi dhīmān ātmānam anveti yathāstimantaṃ // AMsa_16.61 //
T06asmahsbu:3252: suvipulam api vittaṃ prāpya naivopakāraṃ vigaṇayati tathārthī dāyakāl lābhahetoḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3253: vidhivad iha sudānair arthinas tarpayitvā mahadupakarasaṃjñāṃ teṣu dhīmān yathaiti // AMsa_16.62 //
T06asmahsbu:3256: svayam apagataśokā dehinaḥ svastharūpā vipulam api gṛhītvā bhuñjate yasya vittaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3257: pathi paramaphalāḍhyād bhogavṛkṣād yathaiva pravisṛtir atibhogī bodhisatvān na so 'nyaḥ // AMsa_16.63 //
T06asmahsbu:3258: pravisṛtir atibhogaś cāsyeti pravisṛtir atibhogī sa ca nānyo bodhisatvād veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3261: caturvibandhapratipakṣabhedāt vīryaṃ parijñeyam iti pradiṣṭam // AMsa_16.64 //
T06asmahsbu:3270: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye tanniśritas tasya yato 'nulābhaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3271: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatāṃ ca siddhiḥ // AMsa_16.65 //
T06asmahsbu:3272: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvaśuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvakuśaladharmaprādhānyaṃ vīryasya nirdiṣṭaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3275: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatā ca siddhir iti karma nirdiṣṭaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3277: sarvā ca lokottarā siddhir laukikī ca kriyate /
T06asmahsbu:3278: vīryāvad avāptaṃ bhavabhogam iṣṭaṃ vīryeṇa śuddhiṃ prabalām upetāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3279: vīryeṇa satkāyam atītya muktā vīryeṇa bodhiṃ paramāṃ vibuddhāḥ // AMsa_16.66 //
T06asmahsbu:3283: punar mataṃ hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ mokṣādhipaṃ pakṣavipakṣam anyat /
T06asmahsbu:3284: tattve praviṣṭaṃ parivartakaṃ ca vīryaṃ mahārthaṃ ca niruktam anyat // AMsa_16.67 //
T06asmahsbu:3285: saṃnāhavīryaṃ prathamaṃ tataś ca prayogavīryaṃ vidhivatprahitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3286: alīnam akṣobhyam atuṣṭivīryaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ pravadanti buddhāḥ // AMsa_16.68 //
T06asmahsbu:3288: tatra hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ samyakprahāṇeṣu ca dvayoḥ kuśaladharmābhivṛddhaye /
T06asmahsbu:3302: sthāmavān vīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv ity ucyate yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3304: līnātyudārāśayabuddhiyogāt vīryaṃ tad alpārthamahārtham iṣṭam // AMsa_16.69 //
T06asmahsbu:3306: yānatraye prayukto yo janas tadāśrayeṇa yathākramaṃ nikṛṣṭamadhyottamaṃ vīryaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3309: līno hi buddhyāśayo yānadvaye prayuktānāṃ kevalātmārthādhikārāt /
T06asmahsbu:3311: ata eva yathākramaṃ vīryaṃ ta dalpārthaṃ mahārtham iva svārthādhikārāc ca /
T06asmahsbu:3312: na vīryavān bhogaparājito 'sti no vīryavān kleśaparājito 'sti /
T06asmahsbu:3313: na vīryavān khedaparājito 'sti no vīryavān prāptiparājito 'sti // AMsa_16.70 //
T06asmahsbu:3315: caturvidho dānādīnāṃ vibandho yena dānādiṣu na pravartate /
T06asmahsbu:3322: anyonyaṃ saṃgrahataḥ prabhedato dharmato nimittāc ca /
T06asmahsbu:3323: ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ viniścayaḥ sarvathā jñeyaḥ // AMsa_16.71 //
T06asmahsbu:3325: abhayapradānena śīlakṣāntisaṃgraho yasmāt tābhyām abhayaṃ dadāti /
T06asmahsbu:3326: dharmadānena dhyānaprajñayor yasmāt tābhyāṃ dharmaṃ dadāti /
T06asmahsbu:3331: dānaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ dānadānaṃ śīladānaṃ yāvat prajñādānaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3334: ye sūtrādayo yeṣu dānādiṣv artheṣu saṃdṛśyante /
T06asmahsbu:3335: ye ca dānādayo yeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante /
T06asmahsbu:3340: śīlam api dānādīnāṃ bhikṣusaṃvarasamādānaṃ sarvasvaparigrahatyāgāc chīlapratiṣṭhitasya ca kṣāntyādiyogāt /
T06asmahsbu:3348: dānaṃ samam iṣyate yathā pāramitāsu priyākhyānaṃ taddeśanā /
T06asmahsbu:3350: tac chabdena pāramitānāṃ grahaṇāt pāramitādeśanā pāramitāsamādāpanety arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3351: samānārthatā yatra paraṃ samādāpayati tatra svayam anuvṛttiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3352: kim arthaṃ punar etāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūnīṣyante /
T06asmahsbu:3363: yathāvāditathākāriṇaṃ hi samādāpakaṃ viditvā yatra kuśale tena pravartitāḥ pare bhavanti tad anuvartante /
T06asmahsbu:3373: yad apy anyat saṃgrahavastudvayam uktaṃ bhagavatā āmiṣasaṃgraho dharmasaṃgrahaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:3381: abandhyaḥ sarvathā caiva jñeyo hy ākārabhedataḥ // AMsa_16.76 //
T06asmahsbu:3383: tatra hīnamadhyottamaḥ saṃgraho bodhisatvānāṃ yānatrayaprayukteṣu veditavyo yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3386: avandhyaḥ sarvathā aṣṭamyādiṣu bhūbhiṣu satvārthasyāvaśyaṃ saṃpādanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3388: sarvārthasiddhau sarveṣāṃ sukhopāyaś ca śasyate // AMsa_16.77 //
T06asmahsbu:3389: ye kecit parṣatkarṣaṇe prayuktāḥ sarvais tair ayam evopāyaḥ samāśrito yaduta catvāri saṃgrahavastūni /
T06asmahsbu:3390: tathā hi sarvārthasiddhaye sarveṣāṃ sukhaś caiṣa upāyaḥ praśasyate buddhaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3392: sarve ta evaṃ tasmāc ca vartma tat satvapācane // AMsa_16.78 //
T06asmahsbu:3393: etena lokatraye 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ paripācane caturṇāṃ saṃgrahavastūnām ekāyanamārgatvaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3396: bhavaviṣayanimittanirvikalpo bhavati sa satvagaṇasya saṃgṛhītā // AMsa_16.79 //
T06asmahsbu:3397: etena yathoktāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitasya bodhisatvasya saṃgrahavastuprayoga darśayati svaparārthasaṃpādanāt pāramitābhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiś ca yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3408: upadheś cittataś cānyā adhimukter nidhānataḥ // AMsa_17.3 //
T06asmahsbu:3410: vastvābhogāvabodhāc ca vimukteś ca tathātvataḥ // AMsa_17.4 //
T06asmahsbu:3413: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā // AMsa_17.5 //
T06asmahsbu:3423: tathoktaiś cādhimuktyādibhir yad uta mahāyānadharmādhimuktaḥ bodhicittotpādataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3424: praṇidhānam eva hi nidhānam atroktaṃ ślokavattvānurodhāt /
T06asmahsbu:3433: tathā tv ato mahābodhiprāpter ity ayaṃ pūjāyāḥ prakārabhedaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3434: hetutaḥ phalataś caiva ātmanā ca parair api /
T06asmahsbu:3435: lābhasatkārataś caiva pratipatter dvidhā ca sā // AMsa_17.6 //
T06asmahsbu:3437: parīttā mahatī pūjā samānāmānikā ca sā /
T06asmahsbu:3438: prayogād gatitaś caiva praṇidhānāc ca sā matā // AMsa_17.7 //
T06asmahsbu:3440: tatrātītā hetuḥ pratyutpannā phalaṃ pratyutpannā hetur anāgatā phalam ity evaṃ hetuphalato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:3445: punaḥ samānā hīnā nirmānā praṇītā trimaṇḍalāvikalpanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3450: punar yāṃ pūjām āyatyāṃ prayojayituṃ praṇidadhāti sā dūre yāṃ praṇihitaḥ kartuṃ sāntike /
T06asmahsbu:3451: katamā punar buddhapūjā paramā veditavyety āha /
T06asmahsbu:3452: buddheṣu pūjā paramā svacittāt dharmādhimuktyāśayato vibhutvāt /
T06asmahsbu:3454: ity ebhiḥ pañcabhir ākāraiḥ svacittapūjā buddheṣu paramā veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:3458: atṛptavipulam uditopakaranirlepakalyāṇāśayaiś ca ye pāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3465: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā // AMsa_17.9 //
T06asmahsbu:3466: mitraṃ śrayed dāntaśamopaśāntaṃ guṇādhikaṃ sodyamam āgamāḍhyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3467: prabuddhatatvaṃ vacas ābhyupetaṃ kṛpātmakaṃ khedavivarjitaṃ ca // AMsa_17.10 //
T06asmahsbu:3472: guṇair adhikaṃ na samaṃ vā nyūnaṃ vā /
T06asmahsbu:3480: satkāralābhaiḥ paricaryayā ca seveta mitraṃ pratipattitaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:3482: dharme tathājñāśaya eva dhīmān mitraṃ pragacchet samaye nataś ca // AMsa_17.11 //
T06asmahsbu:3487: satkāralābheṣu gataspṛho 'sau prapattaye taṃ pariṇāmayec ca /
T06asmahsbu:3488: iti pariṇāmanā pratipattyarthaṃ sevanān na lābhasatkārārthaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3489: yathānuśiṣṭapratipattitaś ca saṃrādhayec cittam ato 'sya dhīraḥ // AMsa_17.12 //
T06asmahsbu:3492: yānatraye kauśalam etya buddhyā svasyaiva yānasya yateta siddhau /
T06asmahsbu:3494: satvān ameyān paripācanāya kṣetrasya śuddhasya ca sādhanāya // AMsa_17.13 //
T06asmahsbu:3496: aprameyāś ca satvāḥ pariśuddhaṃ ca buddhakṣetraṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3499: dharmeṣu dāyād aguṇena yukto naivāmiṣeṇa pravesat sa mitram /
T06asmahsbu:3503: ata ūrdhvamadhyardhena ślokena prakārabhedaḥ sevāyā veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3504: hetoḥ phalād dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ bahitaś ca dhīmān // AMsa_17.14 //
T06asmahsbu:3506: hetoḥ phalād ity atītādibhedataḥ pūrvavat dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ (Msa 121)
T06asmahsbu:3508: dharmamukhasroto hi dharmamukhānuyānaṃ bahirdhā bahitaḥ śrutaśravāc cetasi yogataś cety audārikasūkṣmabhedaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3512: gatiprayogapraṇidhānataś ca kalyāṇamitraṃ hi bhajet dhīmān // AMsa_17.15 //
T06asmahsbu:3514: katamā punaḥ paramā seveti saptamaḥ ślokaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3519: brāhmā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatāś ca nirvikalpena /
T06asmahsbu:3531: punaḥ katamasmin satvanikāye dharme vā pravartante /
T06asmahsbu:3533: saukhyārthini duḥkhārte sukhite kliṣṭe ca te pravartante /
T06asmahsbu:3534: taddeśite ca dharme tat tathatāyāṃ ca dhīrāṇām // AMsa_17.18 //
T06asmahsbu:3535: satvālambanāḥ sukhārthini yāvat kliṣṭe satvanikāye pravartante /
T06asmahsbu:3543: te hy avikalpatvād anālambanā ivety anālambanāḥ / api khalu /
T06asmahsbu:3545: karmadvayād anālambā maitrī kleśakṣayād api // AMsa_17.19 //
T06asmahsbu:3547: ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇair anālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:3555: manomayānāṃ granthānāṃ prahāṇād ucchidyate ālambanam iti vacanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3556: te niścalāś ca calāś ca kṛpaṇair āsvāditā na ca jñeyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3557: te ca brāhmyā vihārāś caturvidhā veditavyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3566: hīnāśayāḥ samānā hīnās te hy anyathā tv adhikāḥ // AMsa_17.21 //
T06asmahsbu:3574: ye 'nutpattikadharmakṣāntirahitā hīnās te mṛdukā ity arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3575: anyathā tv adhikā iti yathoktaviparyayeṇādhimātratā veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:3576: brāhmyair vihṛtavihāraḥ kāmiṣu saṃjāyate yadā dhīmān /
T06asmahsbu:3577: saṃbhārān pūrayate satvāṃś ca vipācayati tena // AMsa_17.22 //
T06asmahsbu:3578: sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyai rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇa /
T06asmahsbu:3579: tatpratyayair api bhṛśair na yāti vikṛtiṃ pramatto 'pi // AMsa_17.23 //
T06asmahsbu:3581: tatra brāhmyair vihṛto vihārair iti hetuḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3586: sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyair vihārair jāyata iti niṣpandaphalaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3587: rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇeti visaṃyogaphalaṃ bhṛśair api tatpratyayair avikṛtigamanaṃ liṅgaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3591: yukto hi bodhisatvo bahuvidham ādīnavaṃ spṛśati // AMsa_17.24 //
T06asmahsbu:3596: kleśair hantyātmānaṃ satvān upahanti śīlam upahanti /
T06asmahsbu:3599: prāptāprāptavihīno manasi mahad duḥkham āpnoti // AMsa_17.26 //
T06asmahsbu:3600: tatra prathamais tribhiḥ padair ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāyety etam ādīnavaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3601: savilekhādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3606: digvidikṣu cāsya pāpako 'varṇaśabdaśloko niścaratīty evaṃ savilekho yāvad ayaśas vīty anena yathākramaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3607: śeṣais tribhiḥ padair yathākramaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavati /
T06asmahsbu:3608: tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity etad ādīnavaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3609: ete sarve doṣā maitryādiṣu susthitasya na bhavanti /
T06asmahsbu:3610: akliṣṭaḥ saṃsāraṃ satvārthaṃ no ca saṃtyajati // AMsa_17.27 //
T06asmahsbu:3613: na tathaikaputrakeṣv api guṇavatsv api bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3616: ity ete ca bodhisatvamaitrādīnāṃ tīvratāṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3623: śatruvaśagā mārakṛtāntarāyāḥ kuśale 'prayuktāḥ duḥkhākrāntāḥ duḥkhābhūtā narakādiṣu /
T06asmahsbu:3636: ity ete daśavidhāḥ satvā bodhisatvakaruṇāyā ālambanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3638: heṭhāpahaṃ hy uttamabodhibījaṃ sukhāvahaṃ tāyapakam iṣṭahetuṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3639: svabhāvadaṃ dharmam upāśritasya bodhir na dūre jinātmajasya // AMsa_17.31 //
T06asmahsbu:3645: evaṃ pañcavidhāṃ karuṇām āśritya buddhatvam adūre veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3647: vijñāya saṃsāragataṃ samagraṃ duḥkhātmakaṃ caiva nirātmakaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:3648: nodvegam āyāti na cāpi doṣaiḥ prabādhyate kāruṇiko 'grabuddhiḥ // AMsa_17.32 //
T06asmahsbu:3649: sarvaṃ saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñāya bodhisatvo nodvegam āyāti kāruṇikatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:3651: evaṃ nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhito bhavati na saṃsāre yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3653: duḥkhātmakaṃ lokam avekṣamāṇo duḥkhāyate vetti ca tadyathāvat /
T06asmahsbu:3654: tasyābhyupāyaṃ parivarjane ca na khedam āyaty api vā kṛpāluḥ // AMsa_17.33 //
T06asmahsbu:3656: vetti ca tad yathāvad iti duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tasya ca duḥkhasya parivarjane 'bhyupāyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3658: etena jānann api saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tatparityāgopāyaṃ ca na khedam āpadyate bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāviśeṣād iti pradarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3660: kṛpā prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyayā ca pūrvaṃ tadabhyāsavidhānayogāt /
T06asmahsbu:3661: vipakṣahīnā ca viśuddhilābhāt caturvidheyaṃ karūṇātmakānāṃ // AMsa_17.34 //
T06asmahsbu:3667: na sā kṛpā yā na samā sadā vā nādhyāśayād vā pratipattito vā /
T06asmahsbu:3668: vairāgyato nānupalambhato vā na bodhisatvo hy akṛpas tathā yaḥ // AMsa_17.35 //
T06asmahsbu:3669: tatra samā sukhitādiṣu yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā /
T06asmahsbu:3677: karuṇā tarur eṣa mahān mūlādiḥ puṣpapatraphalaḥ // AMsa_17.36 //
T06asmahsbu:3685: mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet /
T06asmahsbu:3686: duḥkhākṣamaś ca dhīmān satvārthaṃ cintayen naiva // AMsa_17.37 //
T06asmahsbu:3689: śubhajanmān anugacchan satvān paripācayen naiva // AMsa_17.38 //
T06asmahsbu:3690: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pūrvottaraprasavasādharmyāt karuṇādīnāṃ mūlādibhāvaṃ sādhayati /
T06asmahsbu:3697: tasyāḥ seko maitrī tayā tadāpy āyanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3699: tataś ca karuṇodbhavaduḥkham utpadyate bodhisatvasya svārthaprayuktasya tatra saukhyotpādād vipulapuṣṭiḥ kṣāntipuṣṭir ity arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3706: ādhyātmikapratyayasiddhitaḥ svasaṃtānaparipākāt puṣpam iva janmābandhyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3709: kaḥ kurvīta na karuṇāṃ satveṣu mahākṛpāguṇakareṣu /
T06asmahsbu:3710: duḥkhe 'pi saukhyam atulaṃ bhavati yad eṣāṃ kṛpājanitaṃ // AMsa_17.41 //
T06asmahsbu:3714: aviṣṭānāṃ kṛpayā na tiṣṭhati manaḥ śame kṛpālūnāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3715: kuta eva lokasaukhye svajīvite vā bhavet snehaḥ // AMsa_17.42 //
T06asmahsbu:3716: sarvasya hi lokasya laukike saukhye svajīvite ca snehaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3717: tatrāpi ca niḥsnehānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sarvaduḥkhopaśame nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhitaṃ manaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3719: tu karuṇāviṣṭatvān nirvāṇe 'pi mano na pratiṣṭhitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3722: sneho na vidyate 'sau yo 'niravadyo na laukiko yaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:3726: bodhisatvānāṃ tu karuṇāmayaḥ sneho niravadyaś ca laukikātikrāntaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:3727: kathaṃ ca punar niravadya ity āha /
T06asmahsbu:3729: uddhartuṃ ya upāyaḥ katham iva na syāt sa niravadyaḥ // AMsa_17.44 //
T06asmahsbu:3733: sneho na so 'sty arihatāṃ loke pratyekabodhibuddhānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3734: prāg eva tad anyeṣāṃ katham iva lokottaro na syāt // AMsa_17.45 //
T06asmahsbu:3739: saṃtrāsayati tad ādau spṛṣṭaṃ tv abhinandayati gāḍhaṃ // AMsa_17.46 //
T06asmahsbu:3741: satveṣu karuṇayā bodhisatvānāṃ yad duḥkham utpadyate tadādau saṃtrāsayati adhimukticaryābhūmau /
T06asmahsbu:3743: spṛṣṭaṃ tu śuddhādhyāśayabhūmāv abhinandayaty evety arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3745: kim ataḥ paramāścaryaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ saukhyam abhibhavati sarva /
T06asmahsbu:3746: kṛpayā janitaṃ laukyaṃ yena vimukto api kṛtārthaḥ // AMsa_17.47 //
T06asmahsbu:3747: nāsty ata āścaryataraṃ yad duḥkham eva karuṇājanitaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ tathā sukhaṃ (Msa 128) bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:3749: yena sukhena vimuktā arhanto 'pi kṛtārthāḥ prāg evānye /
T06asmahsbu:3751: kṛpayā sahitaṃ dānaṃ yad dānasukhaṃ karoti dhīrāṇāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3752: traidhātukam upabhogair na tatsukhaṃ tatkalāṃ spṛśati // AMsa_17.48 //
T06asmahsbu:3753: yacca traidhātukaṃ sukham upabhogaiḥ kṛtaṃ na tatsukhaṃ tasya sukhasya kalāṃ spṛśatīty ayam uttarārdhasyārthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3756: duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati satvārthaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3757: parahitahetor duḥkhaṃ kiṃ kārūṇikair na samupetam // AMsa_17.49 //
T06asmahsbu:3761: karūṇā dānaṃ bhogāḥ sadā kṛpālor vivṛddhim upayānti /
T06asmahsbu:3762: snehānugrahajanitaṃ tac chaktikṛtaṃ sukhaṃ cāsmāt // AMsa_17.50 //
T06asmahsbu:3767: tasmāc ca trayāt phalaṃ trividhaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:3772: vardhe ca vardhayāmi ca dāne paripācayāmi sukhayāmi /
T06asmahsbu:3773: ākarṣāmi nayāmi ca karuṇāsannān pravadatīva // AMsa_17.51 //
T06asmahsbu:3783: duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhāny anādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt /
T06asmahsbu:3784: sukhayaty ātmānam ataḥ kṛpālur ādhāya parasaukhyam // AMsa_17.52 //
T06asmahsbu:3785: karuṇayā bodhisatvaḥ paraduḥkhair duḥkhitaḥ satveṣv anādhāya sukhaṃ kathaṃ sukhitaḥ (Msa 129) syāt /
T06asmahsbu:3786: tasmāt pareṣu sukham ādhāya bodhisatva ātmānam eva sukhayatīti veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3788: svaṃ dānaṃ kāruṇikaḥ śāstīva sadaiva niḥsvasukhakāmaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3789: bhogaiḥ sukhaya paraṃ vā māma py ayutasaukhyam // AMsa_17.53 //
T06asmahsbu:3790: na hi kāruṇikasya vinā parasukhenāsti sukhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3791: tasyāyutasaukhyatvād bodhisatvas tena vinā no dānasya phalaṃ sukhaṃ necchati /
T06asmahsbu:3792: saphalaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tan me satveṣu tat sukhasukhena /
T06asmahsbu:3793: phala teṣv eva nikāmaṃ yadi me kartavyatā te 'sti // AMsa_17.54 //
T06asmahsbu:3794: dānaṃ dadatā dānaṃ ca dānaphalaṃ ca tanmayā satveṣu dattaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3796: atas teṣv eva yāvat phalitavyaṃ tāvat phaleti loṭ /
T06asmahsbu:3799: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me dāne pāraṃparo 'smi yataḥ // AMsa_17.55 //
T06asmahsbu:3803: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me yad bhogās tathopatiṣṭhate /
T06asmahsbu:3804: yasmād ahaṃ dāne pāraṃparas tatprabandhakāmatvān na sukhe /
T06asmahsbu:3806: nanu te tena jñeyaṃ na matphalenārthitā 'syeti // AMsa_17.56 //
T06asmahsbu:3807: yo 'haṃ dānaphalaṃ sarvam eva karuṇayā nityaṃ parityajāmi nanv ata eva veditavyaṃ nāsti me dānaphalenārthitvam iti bodhisatvo dānaṃ samanuśāsti
T06asmahsbu:3808: dānābhirato na syāṃ prāptaṃ cet tatphalaṃ na visṛjeyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3810: kṣaṇam api dānena vinā dānābhirato bhavati naiva // AMsa_17.57 //
T06asmahsbu:3812: akṛtaṃ na phalasi yasmāt pratikārāpekṣayā na me tulyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3814: yas tvā karoti tasya tvaṃ phalasi /
T06asmahsbu:3817: pratikāranirvyapekṣaḥ paratra phalado 'sya kāmaṃ te // AMsa_17.58 //
T06asmahsbu:3820: niravadyaṃ śuddhapadaṃ hitāv ahaṃ caiva sānurakṣaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:3827: nirmṛgyam ayācamāne 'py arthitvaṃ vighātaṃ vāvagamya svayam eva dānāt dakṣiṇīyāparimārgaṇāc ca /
T06asmahsbu:3830: sakalaṃ vipulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ satataṃ muditaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ śuddhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3842: na tathopabhogatuṣṭiṃ labhate bhogī yathā parityāgāt /
T06asmahsbu:3844: tatra sukhatrayaṃ dānaprītiḥ parānugrahaprītiḥ bodhisaṃbhārasaṃbharaṇaprītiś ca /
T06asmahsbu:3855: eṣu pāramitāvipakṣadharmāvasthiteṣu yā karuṇā sā kṛpaṇādikaruṇā /
T06asmahsbu:3860: karuṇā bodhisatvānāṃ hetor mitrāt svabhāvataḥ // AMsa_17.63 //
T06asmahsbu:3862: trividhāṃ vedanām ālambya tisṛbhir duḥkhatābhiḥ karuṇāyanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3863: aduḥkhāsukhā hi vedanā sukhaduḥkhayor anvayaḥ punas tadāvāhanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3864: uttarārdhena yathākramaṃ hetumitrasvabhāvaiḥ karuṇāyā hetvadhipatisamanantarapratyayān saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3867: pratipatter virāgāc ca nopalambhād viśuddhitaḥ // AMsa_17.64 //
T06asmahsbu:3868: tatra samā trividhavedanāvastheṣu yat kiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā /
T06asmahsbu:3875: āśayato 'pi vibhutvād avikalpād aikyataś cāpi // AMsa_17.65 //
T06asmahsbu:3879: etena yathoktānāṃ pūjāsevā'pramāṇānām anukramaṃ guṇaṃ ca samāsena saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3880: mahopadhibhir dhruvaṃ satkriyā cātyarthaṃ pūjanān mahadupadhidhruvasatkriyābhipūjī veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3890: lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
T06asmahsbu:3892: etena svabhāvasahāyālambhanakarmapadā caturvidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisatvalajjāyāḥ saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3898: tasyām eva lajjāpāramitāvipakṣavṛddhyā tatpratipakṣaparihāṇyā cātyarthaṃ lajjotpādanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3902: kleśānukuleṣu dharmeṣv indriyāguptadvāratvādiṣu ca prayogena lajjotpādanāt /
T06asmahsbu:3904: hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tv adhikā // AMsa_18.3 //
T06asmahsbu:3907: ataḥ paraṃ caturbhis tribhiś ca ślokair yathākramaṃ lajjāvipakṣe lajjāyāṃ ca doṣaguṇabhedaṃ darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3909: pratighopekṣāmānaḥ satvān upahanti śīlaṃ ca // AMsa_18.4 //
T06asmahsbu:3911: ity atra ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābadhāyobhayavyābhādhāya cety saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3915: kaukṛtyāt savilekho bhavati sa saṃmānahānim āpnoti /
T06asmahsbu:3916: śrāddhāt mānuṣasaṃghāc chāstrā copekṣyate tasmāt // AMsa_18.5 //
T06asmahsbu:3919: ity etena dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3925: ity anena dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavatīty saṃdarśitam prāptakuśaladharmaparihānitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3927: duḥkhaṃ viharati tasmān manaso 'py asvasthatām eti // AMsa_18.7 //
T06asmahsbu:3928: ity etena lajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3929: ete sarve doṣā hrīmatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu /
T06asmahsbu:3931: yad ete ca doṣā na bhavanti /
T06asmahsbu:3932: deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ // AMsa_18.8 //
T06asmahsbu:3934: saṃbhārāṃś ca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān /
T06asmahsbu:3936: satvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ // AMsa_18.9 //
T06asmahsbu:3939: sa vipakṣapratipakṣai rahito 'rahitaś ca jāyate satataṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3942: ity etam ānuśaṃsaṃ hrīmān āpnoti jinaputraḥ // AMsa_18.10 //
T06asmahsbu:3943: iti yathoktadoṣābhāvaṃ guṇayogaṃ ca prāpnotīti saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3944: doṣamalino hi bālo hrīvirahāt suvasanaiḥ sugupto 'pi /
T06asmahsbu:3949: ākāśam iva na lipto hrīyuktaḥ jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3951: hrībhūṣitaś ca śobhati saṃparkagato jinasutānām // AMsa_18.12 //
T06asmahsbu:3953: mātur iva vatsalatvaṃ hriyo vineyeṣu bodhisatvānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3955: ārakṣā cāpi hrīḥ saṃsaratāṃ sarvadoṣebhyaḥ // AMsa_18.13 //
T06asmahsbu:3957: ebhir vastrādidṛṣṭāntair vihāre kleśapratipakṣatāṃ cāre lokadharmapratipakṣatāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3961: sarveṣu ca pravṛttir hrīvihitaṃ hrīmato liṅgam // AMsa_18.14 //
T06asmahsbu:3963: etena caturvidhaṃ hrīkṛtaṃ liṅgam hrīmato darśayati /
T06asmahsbu:3964: yad uta sarvadoṣeṣv anadhivāsanā cāpravṛttiś ca /
T06asmahsbu:3967: āśayato 'pi vibhutvād akalpanād aikyataś cāpi // AMsa_18.15 //
T06asmahsbu:3971: dṛḍhatvena ca sarvebhyas tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate // AMsa_18.16 //
T06asmahsbu:3972: vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca satvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā /
T06asmahsbu:3973: nirbhīto bodhisatvo hi trayād yasmāt pravartate // AMsa_18.17 //
T06asmahsbu:3978: katamasmāt trayān nirbhītaḥ pravartate ity āha /
T06asmahsbu:3979: līnatvāc ca calatvāc ca mohāc cotpadyate bhayaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:3980: kṛtyeṣu tasmād vijñeyā dhṛtisaṃjñā nije traye // AMsa_18.18 //
T06asmahsbu:3981: sravakāryeṣu hi līnacittatayā vā bhayam utpadyate tadanutsāhataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:3985: tasmān nijavīryāditraye dhṛtisaṃjñā veditavyā nija ity apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīye
T06asmahsbu:3986: prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:3989: duṣkareṣu vicitreṣu saṃsārātyāga eva ca // AMsa_18.20 //
T06asmahsbu:3990: niḥsaṃkleśe ca tatraiva dhṛtir dhīrasya jāyate /
T06asmahsbu:3991: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ mataḥ // AMsa_18.21 //
T06asmahsbu:4005: śalabhaiḥ pakṣavātaiś ca samudraiś ca sumeruvat // AMsa_18.22 //
T06asmahsbu:4012: aniṣpannaś ca niṣpannaḥ suniṣpannaś ca bhūmiṣu // AMsa_18.24 //
T06asmahsbu:4020: tābhyāṃ hi khedotpattito lajjayate na cotpādayati /
T06asmahsbu:4030: gṛhītā satvapākāya saddharmasya ca dhāraṇe // AMsa_18.26 //
T06asmahsbu:4032: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
T06asmahsbu:4034: karma prathamavastuni svayaṃ pratipattiḥ parebhyaś ca tatsamākhyānaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4039: lakṣaṇaṃ śāstrajñatāyā etāny evas pañca vastuni śrutāni bhavanti /
T06asmahsbu:4051: sā punar eṣā śāstrajñatā bodhisatvānāṃ samādhimukhair dhāraṇīmukhaiś ca saṃgṛhītā /
T06asmahsbu:4057: lokajñatā hi dhīrāṇāṃ tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate // AMsa_18.27 //
T06asmahsbu:4062: sā punaḥ kim artham ity āha /
T06asmahsbu:4068: dvayād astaṃgamas tasmāt tajjño lokajña ucyate // AMsa_18.29 //
T06asmahsbu:4069: dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ lokasya udayaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāro yaś codayo yena ceti kṛtvā /
T06asmahsbu:4074: śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4075: satyajñānād yato dhīmān lokajño hi nirucyate // AMsa_18.30 //
T06asmahsbu:4081: prāmāṇikaś ca nītārtho nirjalpā prāptir asya ca // AMsa_18.31 //
T06asmahsbu:4083: tatra prāmāṇika 'rtho yaḥ pramāṇabhūtena nīto vibhaktaḥ śāstrā vā tatpramāṇīkṛtena vā /
T06asmahsbu:4088: sābhilāṣasya ca prāpteḥ pratiṣedho 'tra deśitaḥ // AMsa_18.32 //
T06asmahsbu:4089: prathame pratisaraṇe ārṣadharmapratikṣeptuḥ pudgalasya pratiṣedgo deśitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4094: adhimukter vicārāc ca yathāvat parataḥ śravāt /
T06asmahsbu:4095: nirjalpād api ca jñānād apraṇāśo hi dhīmatāṃ // AMsa_18.33 //
T06asmahsbu:4103: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānāc ca tā matāḥ // AMsa_18.34 //
T06asmahsbu:4104: prathamā paryāye jñānam ekaikasyārthastha yāvanto nāma paryāyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4106: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4109: deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā /
T06asmahsbu:4110: dharmārthayor dvayor vācā jñānenaiva ca deśanā // AMsa_18.35 //
T06asmahsbu:4114: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca /
T06asmahsbu:4115: tatra jñānena prayojanaṃ kasya punar deśanā //
T06asmahsbu:4119: dharmasyoddeśanirdeśāt vākyena deśanā tayor eva dvayor sarvathā prāpaṇāt /
T06asmahsbu:4121: ato yac ca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4124: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karam ca darśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4125: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāṃ etya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃvid iti nirvacanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4130: yaś ca saṃbhāro yad arthaṃ ca saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:4134: dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4135: trayaṃ cānyad dvayasyāpi pañcāpi jñānasaṃbhṛtiḥ // AMsa_18.39 //
T06asmahsbu:4140: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanāt sarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4141: saṃtatyā bhāvanām etya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
T06asmahsbu:4142: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vīdhīre sarvārthasādhakaḥ // AMsa_18.40 //
T06asmahsbu:4160: dhīmatām asamatvāt sā tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate // AMsa_18.42 //
T06asmahsbu:4162: niśrayāt pratipakṣāc ca avatārāt tathaiva ca /
T06asmahsbu:4166: ity ebhiś caturdaśabhir ākārair bodhisatvānāṃ smṛtyupastānabhāvanā viśiṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:4167: katham āśrayato mahāyāne śrutacintābhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām āśritya /
T06asmahsbu:4168: kathaṃ pratipakṣataḥ caturviparyāsapratipakṣāṇām apy aśuciduḥkhānityānātmasaṃjñānaṃ pratipakṣatvāt kāyādidharmanairātmyapraveśataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4170: caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair yathākramaṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasatyāvatārāt svayaṃ pareṣāṃ cāvatāraṇāt /
T06asmahsbu:4175: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃ yogāya nāvasaṃyogāya /
T06asmahsbu:4177: katham anuvṛttitaḥ laukikānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ cānuvṛttyā tadupasaṃhitasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāt tebhyas tadupadeśārthaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4183: katham utpattitaḥ saṃcintyabhavopapattau cakravartyādibhūtasya viśiṣṭakāyavedanādisaṃpattau tadasaṃkleśataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4184: kathaṃ mātrataḥ mṛdvā api smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyās tad anyebhyo adhimātratvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4187: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt /
T06asmahsbu:4193: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4196: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu // AMsa_18.46 //
T06asmahsbu:4198: satvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ // AMsa_18.47 //
T06asmahsbu:4199: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:4212: ye (Msa 142) ca vipakṣās teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvanā veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:4221: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate /
T06asmahsbu:4222: sā ca bhāvanā śamathapragrahopekṣānimittaiḥ saha bhāvyatge /
T06asmahsbu:4225: yac chamathapragrahopakleśayor layāuddhatyayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa vīryam ārabhate /
T06asmahsbu:4228: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:4231: sarvārthasiddhau jāyante ātmanaś ca parasya ca // AMsa_18.50 //
T06asmahsbu:4232: sarvārthasiddhir laukikī lokottarā ca veditavyā ca /
T06asmahsbu:4234: niśrayāc ca prabhedāc ca upāyād abhinirhṛteḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4238: upāyaś cābhinirhāraḥ ṣaḍvidhaś ca vidhīyate // AMsa_18.52 //
T06asmahsbu:4244: naibandhikas tṛtīyaś ca caturthaḥ prātipakṣikaḥ // AMsa_18.53 //
T06asmahsbu:4246: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śaddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ
T06asmahsbu:4248: praśrabdhir anugrahātmakaḥ smṛtiḥ saṃ prajanyaṃ copanibandhakaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4255: praṇidher vaśitāyaś ca dharmaprāpteś ca nirhṛtiḥ // AMsa_18.54 //
T06asmahsbu:4256: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuś ca /
T06asmahsbu:4258: tābhir upasaṃkramya bhāṣā cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt /
T06asmahsbu:4259: sthitivikrīḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisatvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4260: praṇidhir yena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisatvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti /
T06asmahsbu:4261: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre /
T06asmahsbu:4262: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4266: bodhiś caryā śruta cātra śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā /
T06asmahsbu:4268: śraddhendriyasya bodhiḥ padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4282: etena yasyām avasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4283: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhād yathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatā ca /
T06asmahsbu:4293: dharmālokavivṛddhyā ca prītyā āpūryate dhruvam // AMsa_18.59 //
T06asmahsbu:4295: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prīṇayati /
T06asmahsbu:4305: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisatvaḥ yathākāmaṃ sarvatra viharati tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena ca vihāreṇānyasyopagamāt /
T06asmahsbu:4307: yathā cakravartinaḥ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyam upanetavyaṃ copapraṇayati /
T06asmahsbu:4309: tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ paraiti /
T06asmahsbu:4315: etena yad bodhyaṅgaṃ yathāṅgaṃ tad abhidyatitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4327: jñeyāvṛtteś ca mārgasya vaiśeṣikaguṇasya ca // AMsa_18.65 //
T06asmahsbu:4330: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśas tena tadrthāvabodhāt /
T06asmahsbu:4333: pratipakṣasya bhāvanā bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ (Msa 146)
T06asmahsbu:4334: hi kālaṃ akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati /
T06asmahsbu:4335: samyaksmṛtyā śamathapragrahopekṣānimitteṣu layāuddhatyābhāvān mārgasaṃmukhībhāvāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati /
T06asmahsbu:4336: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayaty evam aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante /
T06asmahsbu:4338: cittasya citte sthānāc ca dharmapravicayād api /
T06asmahsbu:4339: samyak sthitim upāśritya śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā // AMsa_18.66 //
T06asmahsbu:4341: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayād yathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:4342: na tu vinā samyaksamādhinety etac chamathavipaśyanālakṣaṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4344: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇam ākaṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt /
T06asmahsbu:4346: ākaṅkṣed bhikṣur aho vatāhaṃ kāmair iti vistreṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāv eva dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau /
T06asmahsbu:4347: yad uta śamathaś vipaśyanā cety evam ādi /
T06asmahsbu:4352: prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hy asaṃskṛte // AMsa_18.67 //
T06asmahsbu:4354: sarvabhūmigatā dhīre sa yogaḥ sarvasādhakaḥ // AMsa_18.68 //
T06asmahsbu:4355: ity upaniṣan matety evamādinā śamathavipaśyanāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4362: saṃskāro hi saṃsṛtaṃ tad atra nāstīty asaṃskṛtaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4363: tad eva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ c pariśodhayitavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4365: tad etad yathākramaṃ pariśuddhir viśuddhiś ca /
T06asmahsbu:4368: kṣipraprāptau kriyāśuddhau vartmācchede ca kauśalaṃ // AMsa_18.69 //
T06asmahsbu:4371: yatkauśalyaṃ samāśritya sarvārthān sādhayanti te // AMsa_18.70 //
T06asmahsbu:4375: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanā 'numodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā /
T06asmahsbu:4379: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisatvānām asamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalyam ity ayaṃ prabhedaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4383: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ // AMsa_18.71 //
T06asmahsbu:4387: prakāśayanti saddharmaṃ nityaṃ saṃdhārayanti ca // AMsa_18.73 //
T06asmahsbu:4388: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ darśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4395: samādhinā mahatī sāpi mahatī punas trividhā /
T06asmahsbu:4396: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ akuśalabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu /
T06asmahsbu:4397: pariśuddhabhūmikā tv adhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ity ayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4400: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat /
T06asmahsbu:4401: praṇidhānaṃ hi dhīrāṇām asamaṃ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_18.74 //
T06asmahsbu:4402: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittāt sadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat /
T06asmahsbu:4407: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4413: āyatyāṃ vābhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittāt punaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathārthasamṛddhitā vedutavyā /
T06asmahsbu:4415: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4416: citram adhimukticaryābhūmāv evaṃ ca syām iti /
T06asmahsbu:4418: viśuddhaṃ uttarottarāsu bhūmiṣu viśuddhiviśeṣād ā bodher ity eṣa prabhedataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4421: nairātmyaṃ dvividhaṃ jñeyo hy ātmagrāhasya cāśrayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4427: sa eva samādhis trividho jñeyo grāhyagrāhakabhāvataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4428: trividhasya grāhasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4429: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4431: nirvikalpo 'pi vimukho ratiyuktaś ca sarvadā // AMsa_18.78 //
T06asmahsbu:4445: tatra saṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ity apraṇihitasya samādhyupaniṣatbhāvena deśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4448: kaḥ punar anityārtho yāvac chāntārthaḥ ity āha /
T06asmahsbu:4450: vikalpopaśamārthaś ca dhīmatāṃ tac catuṣṭayam // AMsa_18.81 //
T06asmahsbu:4452: yan nityaṃ nāsti tad anityaṃ teṣāṃ yat parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4455: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpata ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tv astīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4463: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskāram iti paścād vacanād iyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:4467: sā cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇam utpādanirodhau na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4468: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4469: tadanantaraṃ pravṛttir na syāt prabandhābhāvāt naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4471: hetuto hi sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam utpadyate bhavatīty arthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4472: tad yadi bhūtvā punar uttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4474: na ca tat tenaiva hetunā bhavitum arhati tasyopayuktahetukatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4476: tasmāt pratikṣaṇam avaśyaṃ pūrvahetukam anyad bhavatīti veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4477: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo no yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4478: atha apy evam iṣyata notpannaṃ punar utpadyate yad arthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syād utapannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścān nirudhyate notpannamātram eveti /
T06asmahsbu:4483: na hi virodhayos tulyo hetur upalabhyate /
T06asmahsbu:4490: māyopamās te bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikās tāvat kālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti /
T06asmahsbu:4492: te hi saṃskārāṇām udayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti /
T06asmahsbu:4493: anyathā hi teṣām api nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syur yathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyantāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4494: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayam eva vā tiṣṭhet svayam eva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4499: kkena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4502: athāpi syād vināpi sthitikāraṇena vināśakāraṇābhāvāt avatiṣṭhate /
T06asmahsbu:4503: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścād vināśayati agnineva śyāmateti /
T06asmahsbu:4505: na hi vināśakāraṇaṃ paścād api kiṃcid asti /
T06asmahsbu:4508: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatir visadṛśī gṛhyate ma tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4509: apām api kvathyamānānām agnisaṃbandhād alpataratamotpattito 'timandyād ante punar anutpattir gṛhyate /
T06asmahsbu:4511: ekāntikaṃ hy saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā yad uta saṃskṛtasyānityatā /
T06asmahsbu:4513: kaṃcit kālam asyānityatā na syād iti anaikāntikam anityatālakṣaṇaṃ prasahyate /
T06asmahsbu:4514: athāpi syāt pratikṣaṇam apūrvotpattau tad evedam iti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syād iti /
T06asmahsbu:4515: tad bhavaty eva sādṛśasya anuvṛtter māyākārapalakavat /
T06asmahsbu:4519: na hi tathaivāvasthitasyānte nirodhaḥ syād ādilakṣaṇanirviśiṣṭatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4520: tasmān na tat tad evety avadhāryate ante pariṇāmopalabdheś ca /
T06asmahsbu:4522: tad yadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhaved ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānām ante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta /
T06asmahsbu:4523: tasmād ādita evānyathātvam ārabdhaṃ yat krameṇābhivardhamānam ante vyaktim āpadyante kṣīrasyeva dadhyavasthāyāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4524: yāvat tu tad anyathātvaṃ sūkṣmatvān na paricchidyate /
T06asmahsbu:4525: tāvat sādṛśyānuvṛttes tad evedam imi jñāyata iti siddhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4532: (Msa 151) kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāś cakṣūrūpādayo hetutaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4534: na tv akṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitum arhati yathā nityād anytyatam iti /
T06asmahsbu:4535: cittsya khalv api sarve saṃskārāḥ phalaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4538: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāś cakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmūrchnāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4539: tasmāt te cittasya phalaṃ cittasya cādhipatyaṃ saṃskāreṣu /
T06asmahsbu:4541: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti /
T06asmahsbu:4542: tathā viñānapratyayaṃ nāma rūpam ity uktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4545: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante /
T06asmahsbu:4547: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃś cittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇam adhimucyate tad apy asya tahaiva syād iti /
T06asmahsbu:4550: tathā hi pāpakāreṣu satveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti /
T06asmahsbu:4554: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4555: evaṃ tāvad aviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4556: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4562: cayāyāpārthād ayogāc ca āśrayatva asaṃbhavāt // AMsa_18.86 //
T06asmahsbu:4566: anuvṛtteś ca cittasya kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam // AMsa_18.88 //
T06asmahsbu:4567: ādyas taratamenāpi yāvat kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam iti /
T06asmahsbu:4577: viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4578: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu parinirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4583: abījatvena yas teṣām evārhataś caram eṣāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4585: yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ utpādaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4586: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyām utpattāv ādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumān aviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4588: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt tad uttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtter uttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt /
T06asmahsbu:4593: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet /
T06asmahsbu:4598: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4600: na hi tiṣṭhaty āśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4601: yena tiṣṭhati ta ārūḍhānavasthānavad anyathā hy āśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet /
T06asmahsbu:4604: ma hi tathāsthitasyaiva rāgādibhir vikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4605: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāv avināśe saty ante vikārābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4606: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau /
T06asmahsbu:4607: na hi tahtāsthiteṣv eva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syād utpattiḥ sugatau vā /
T06asmahsbu:4613: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatir nāma kācit kriyā yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4614: sa hy utpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayed anutpannā vā /
T06asmahsbu:4615: yad utpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcid gata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
T06asmahsbu:4616: athānutpannā tena asatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4617: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4621: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārād anyopalabhyate /
T06asmahsbu:4622: tasmān nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃtatyutpādād anyā gatiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4630: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyos tiryaggamanam agner ūrdhvaṃ jvalanam apāṃ nimne syandanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4636: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvam antareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasmin kāle punar bījabhāvo yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4638: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvam abhyupagantuṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4640: tathā hi caramatvam eva na saṃbhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4643: ekāntāt sādhitam ādhyātmikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam kṣaṇikam iti /
T06asmahsbu:4646: śoṣavṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaḥ // AMsa_18.89 //
T06asmahsbu:4650: cittānuvṛtteḥ pṛcchātaḥ kṣaṇikaṃ bāhyam apy ataḥ // AMsa_18.91 //
T06asmahsbu:4655: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍvidhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate /
T06asmahsbu:4660: tac cobhayam antareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na syāt paścād viśeṣakāraṇābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4661: vāyoḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:4662: na hy avasthitasya calatvaṃ syāt tatsvabhāvād iti prasādhitam etat /
T06asmahsbu:4665: tac chabenāpaś ca gṛhyante vāyuś ca /
T06asmahsbu:4666: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle /
T06asmahsbu:4673: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ anyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4674: varṇagandharasasparśānāṃ pṛthivyādibhis tulyakāraṇatvāt tathaiva kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4676: (Msa 154) na hi tejasy utpanne tejaḥsahotpannam indhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate /
T06asmahsbu:4677: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4679: ślokabadhānurodhād varṇādīnāṃ pūrvam abhidhānaṃ paścāt tejasaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4680: śabdaḥ punar yo 'pi kālāntaram upalabhyate ghaṇṭhādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ na hy asati kṣaṇikatve pratikṣaṇamandataratamopalabdhiḥ syāt /
T06asmahsbu:4681: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddham eva cittānuvṛtter yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4683: pṛcchrayate khalv api sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā /
T06asmahsbu:4685: kasmād bhavān anityatvam icchati na saṃskārārāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ necchatīti /
T06asmahsbu:4686: yady evaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇam anyatvasyāgrahaṇād iti sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4687: prasiddhakṣaṇikabhāveṣv api pradīpādiṣu niścalāvasthāyāṃ tadagrahaṇād akṣaṇikatvaṃ kasmān neṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:4688: yady evaṃ vadet pūrvavat paścād agrahaṇād iti /
T06asmahsbu:4691: yady evaṃ vadet vilakṣaṇatvāt pradīpāditadanyasaṃskārāṇām iti /
T06asmahsbu:4693: dvidhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
T06asmahsbu:4694: tad yadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyam abhipretam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4695: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaur vā gor iti /
T06asmahsbu:4696: atha vṛttavailakṣaṇyam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpapradīpānāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:4698: kaccid icchasi yāne tiṣṭhati yānāruḍho gacched iti /
T06asmahsbu:4701: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tad āśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4702: yady evaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avathānam iti /
T06asmahsbu:4704: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyā pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatter iti /
T06asmahsbu:4705: yady evaṃ vadet sati kaṇikatve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmāt pradīpād iva kṣaṇikatvaṃ na siddham iti /
T06asmahsbu:4707: sadṛśasaṃtatiprabandhavṛttyā hi kṣaṇikatvam eṣāṃ na prajñāyate /
T06asmahsbu:4708: yataḥ saty apy aparāparatve tad evedam iti viparyāso jāyate /
T06asmahsbu:4709: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāt tadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punar vyavadānam ity evaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4711: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
T06asmahsbu:4715: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4718: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4719: indhanāgnyor avācyatvam upalabdher dvayena hi // AMsa_18.95 //
T06asmahsbu:4720: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4721: nairarthakyād ato draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate // AMsa_18.96 //
T06asmahsbu:4722: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
T06asmahsbu:4723: tatkarmalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃbodho bādhyate tridhā // AMsa_18.97 //
T06asmahsbu:4724: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
T06asmahsbu:4727: darśanādiṣu yatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ na yujyate // AMsa_18.99 //
T06asmahsbu:4728: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4729: tṛtīyapakṣābhāvāc ca pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate // AMsa_18.100 //
T06asmahsbu:4731: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca // AMsa_18.101 //
T06asmahsbu:4735: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā // AMsa_18.103 //
T06asmahsbu:4736: pudgalaḥ kim astīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ / āha /
T06asmahsbu:4737: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
T06asmahsbu:4738: yataś ca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4739: evam anekāṃśavādaparigrahe naivāstitve doṣāvakāśo na nāstitve /
T06asmahsbu:4740: sa punar dravyato nāstīti kathaṃ veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4742: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat upalabdhir hi nāma buddhyā pratipattiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4743: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4745: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānam nupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdhā bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4746: na sa evam upalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4748: viparyāsāt tathā hy anātmany ātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā /
T06asmahsbu:4749: tasmād ya evaṃ pudgalagrāho viparyāsaḥ saḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4752: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hy eṣa saṃkleśo yad uta ahaṃ mameti /
T06asmahsbu:4753: na ca viparyāsaḥ saṃkleśo bhavitum arahati /
T06asmahsbu:4754: na caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4758: yatra punar vastuni rūpādisaṃjñake prajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmāt kim ekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvid anyatvena / āha /
T06asmahsbu:4764: ekatve hi skandhānām ātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasatvaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4766: evaṃ hi pudgalsya prajñaptito 'stitvād avaktavyatvaṃ yuktaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4768: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanam atikramya pudgalsya dravyato 'stitvam icchanti ta idaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4769: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4773: yathāgnir andhanān nānyo nānyo vaktavya iti /
T06asmahsbu:4775: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4777: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnir hi nāma tejodhātur indhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni /
T06asmahsbu:4778: teṣāṃ ca bhinnaṃ lakṣaṇam ity anya evāgnir indhanāt /
T06asmahsbu:4779: loke ca vināpy agninā dṛṣṭam indhanaṃ kāṣṭād vināpi cendhanenāgnir iti siddham anyatvaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4780: śāstre ca bhagavatā na kvacid agnīndhanayor avācyatvam uktam ity ayuktam etat /
T06asmahsbu:4781: vinā punar indhanenāgnir astīti katham idaṃ vijñāyate /
T06asmahsbu:4782: upalabdhes tathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūram api jvalat paraiti /
T06asmahsbu:4783: athāpi syād vāyus tatrendhanam iti ata evāgnīndhanayor anyatvam it siddhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4786: dvayaṃ hi tatropalabhyate arcir vāyuś cendhanatvena /
T06asmahsbu:4787: asty eva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvad vijñāntā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā (Msa 157) ca /
T06asmahsbu:4790: sa hi darśanādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā /
T06asmahsbu:4792: dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4795: na hi tatra kiṃcit sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4796: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
T06asmahsbu:4797: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavann aniṣṭaṃ vijñānam anityaṃ na pravartayet /
T06asmahsbu:4800: asau draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4807: tasmiṃś ca dravyata iṣyamāṇe buddhasya bhagavataḥ
T06asmahsbu:4812: ni hi pudgalābhisaṃbodhe kiṃcid gambhīram abhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4818: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvad vijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhaven niṣpratyatno vā /
T06asmahsbu:4819: saprayatnasya vā punar asau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr vā bhaved ākasmikaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4821: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
T06asmahsbu:4825: niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4828: ity asati vyāpare pudgalasya darśanādau katham asau draṣṭā bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:4829: yāvad vijñātā doṣatrayād ity uktaṃ katamasmād doṣatrayāt /
T06asmahsbu:4832: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni /
T06asmahsbu:4833: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudglaḥ karteti katham asau draṣṭā bhavati yāvad vijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācit prayatno na syād anityo na syāt /
T06asmahsbu:4834: nitye ca prayatne darśnādīnāṃyugapac ca nityaṃ ca pravṛrtiḥ syād iti doṣaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4835: tasmān na yujyate darśnādiṣu prayatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4836: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4839: tasya tathā sthitasya prayatnatvaṃ na yujyate /
T06asmahsbu:4841: sati hi tatprayatnatve na kadācit pudgalo nāstīti /
T06asmahsbu:4842: kim arthaṃ prāk prayatno na syād yadā notpannaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4844: tṛtīyaś ca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yan na sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syād iti /
T06asmahsbu:4846: evaṃ tāvad yuktima āśritya dravyataḥ pudgalo nopalabhyate /
T06asmahsbu:4848: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca //
T06asmahsbu:4849: dharmoddāneṣu hi bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti deśitaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyām
T06asmahsbu:4850: asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakas tu nopalabhyate ya imaṃś ca skhandān nikṣipati anyāṃś
T06asmahsbu:4854: ātmadṛṣṭir bhavati jīvadṛṣṭiḥ nirviśeṣo bhavati tīrthikaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4856: śūnyatāyām asya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate /
T06asmahsbu:4859: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4860: (Msa 159) parijñātāvī bhārahāraḥ śraddhānusāryādipudgalavyavasthānata ity asati dravyato 'stitve kasmād deśitaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4864: pudgalaprajñaptim antareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś ca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4865: parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4869: tayor vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa parijñātāvībhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4871: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
T06asmahsbu:4872: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ity ayam atra nayo veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4874: na hi tāvad asāv ātmadṛṣṭyutpādanārthaṃ yujyate yasmāt
T06asmahsbu:4877: yadi cātmadarśanena mokṣa ity asau deśyeta /
T06asmahsbu:4879: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānām ātmadarśanaṃ vidyate /
T06asmahsbu:4881: na hi pūrvam ātmānam anātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścid ātmato gṛhṇāti /
T06asmahsbu:4882: yathā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhataḥ pūrvam agṛhītvā paścād gṛhṇātīti yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścād api mokṣo na syāt /
T06asmahsbu:4883: sati cātmany avaśyam ahaṃkāramamakārābhyām ātmatṛṣṇayā cānyaiś ca tannidānaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:4884: kleśair bhavitavyam iti ato 'pi mokṣo na syāt /
