T06asmahsbu:5413: prakurvanti hi satvārthaṃ gṛhiṇaḥ sarvajanmasu // AMsa_20-21.3 //
T06asmahsbu:5415: nidarśikā ca pravrajayā dhīmatāṃ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.4 //
T06asmahsbu:5416: aprameyair guṇair yuktaḥ pakṣaḥ pravrajitasya tu /
T06asmahsbu:5417: gṛhiṇo bodhisatvād dhi yatis tasmād viśiṣyate // AMsa_20-21.5 //
T06asmahsbu:5418: etena ślokena yādṛśe gṛhapakṣe sthito bodhisatvaḥ satvārthaṃ karoti tatparidīpitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5427: nirvāṇecchā ca dhīrāṇāṃ satveṣv āśaya iṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:5428: aśuddhaś ca viśuddhaś ca suviśuddhaḥ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.6 //
T06asmahsbu:5431: paratreṣṭaphalecchā hitādhyāśayaḥ ihaiva kuśalapravṛttīcchā nirvāṇecchā tadubhayāhyāśaya eveti nānyo veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5437: gaṇasya karṣaṇatvāc ca dhīmatāṃ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.7 //
T06asmahsbu:5438: caturvidhaḥ satvaparigraho bodhisatvānāṃ praṇidhānaparigraho veditavyo bodhicittena sarvasatvaparigrahaṇāt /
T06asmahsbu:5444: samādheś ca vibhutvasya cotpattir dhīmatāṃ matā // AMsa_20-21.8 //
T06asmahsbu:5448: samādhyādhipatyena yā dhyānāni vyāvartya kāmadhātāv upapattiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5452: nirukteḥ prāptitaś caiva vihāro bhūmir eva ca // AMsa_20-21.9 //
T06asmahsbu:5455: vihṛtya sasukhair dhyānair janma kāme tataḥ param // AMsa_20-21.10 //
T06asmahsbu:5457: vinā ca cittasaṃkleśaṃ satvānāṃ paripācanā // AMsa_20-21.11 //
T06asmahsbu:5461: satvapākasya niṣpattir jāyate ca tataḥ param // AMsa_20-21.13 //
T06asmahsbu:5463: etasmāc ca vyavasthānād vijñeyaṃ bhūmilakṣaṇam // AMsa_20-21.14 //
T06asmahsbu:5468: tṛtīyāyāṃ sātiśayasukhair bodhisatvadhyānair vihṛtyāparihīnasyaiva tebhyaḥ kāmadhātāv upapattiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5470: pañcamyāṃ caturāryasatyabahulavihāritayā vinātamanaś cittasaṃkleśena satvānāṃ paripācanāyāṃ nānāśāstraśilpapraṇayanāt /
T06asmahsbu:5474: aṣṭamyāṃ animitte 'py anābhogo nirabhisaṃskāra-animittavihāritvād buddhakṣetraviśodhanā ca /
T06asmahsbu:5478: bhūmiṣṭhe ca pudgalavibhāgam ārabhya dvau ślokau /
T06asmahsbu:5481: upekṣakaḥ kṣetraviśodhakaś ca syāt satvapāke kuśalo maharddhiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5482: saṃpūrṇakāyaś ca nidarśane ca śakto 'bhiṣiktaḥ khalu bodhisatvaḥ // AMsa_20-21.16 //
T06asmahsbu:5488: pañcamyāṃ saṃtānabhede nirmāṇo daśabhiś cittāśayaviśuddhisamatābhiḥ sarvasaṃtānasamatāpraveśāt /
T06asmahsbu:5489: ṣaṣṭyāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānabhede nirmāṇaḥ pratītyasamutpādatathatābahulavihāritayā kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣābhyāṃ tathatāyāḥ saṃkleśvyavadānādarśanāt /
T06asmahsbu:5491: saptamyām ekakṣaṇalabdhabuddhir nirnimittavihārasāmarthyāt pratipakṣaṇaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhpakṣabhāvanātaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5492: aṣṭamyām upekṣakaḥ kṣetraviśodhakaś cānābhoganirnimittavihāritvād miśra-upamiśraprayogataś cāvinivartanīyabhūmipraviṣṭair bodhisatvaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5494: daśamyāṃ bodhisatvabhūmau bodhisatvo maharddhikaś ca vyavasthāpyate mahābhijñālābhāt /
T06asmahsbu:5495: saṃpūrṇakāyaś cāpramāṇasamādhidhāraṇīmukhasphuraṇād āśrayasya nidarśane ca śakto vyavasthāpyate tuṣitabhavanavāsādinirmāṇanidarśanāt /
T06asmahsbu:5499: adhicitte 'py adhiprajñe prajñā tu dvayagocarā // AMsa_20-21.17 //
T06asmahsbu:5500: dharmatatvaṃ tadajñānajñānād yā vṛttir eva ca /
T06asmahsbu:5501: prajñāyā gocaras tasmād dvibhūmau tadvyavasthitiḥ // AMsa_20-21.18 //
T06asmahsbu:5503: śikṣāṇāṃ bhāvanāyāś ca phalam anyac caturvidham /
T06asmahsbu:5506: kṣetraśuddhiś ca satvānāṃ pākaniṣpattir eva ca // AMsa_20-21.20 //
T06asmahsbu:5508: caturvidhaṃ phalaṃ hy etat caturbhūmisamāśritam // AMsa_20-21.21 //
T06asmahsbu:5509: prathamāyāṃ bhūmau dharmatāṃ pratividhya dvitīyāyām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣate /
T06asmahsbu:5519: ataḥ paraṃ caturvidhaṃ śikṣāphalaṃ caturbhūmisamāśritaṃ veditavyaṃ yathākramaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5520: tatra dvitīyaṃ phalaṃ sa evānimitto vihāro 'nabhisaṃskāraḥ kṣetraśuddhiś ca veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5527: tad anyāsv iti saptamyāṃ yāvad buddhabūmāv abhayor vimuktivimuktijñānayor viśodhanā /
T06asmahsbu:5528: sā punar vimuktiś caturvidhaphalāvaraṇāc ca veditavyā pratighātāvaraṇāc ca buddhabhūmau /
T06asmahsbu:5534: niṣpannā apy aniṣpannā niṣpannāś ca punar matāḥ // AMsa_20-21.24 //
T06asmahsbu:5540: tatrādhimukticaryābhūmir aniṣpannā śeṣā niṣpannā ity etāḥ sarvabhūmayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5541: niṣpannā api punaḥ saptamāniṣpannāḥ śeṣā niṣpannā nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /
T06asmahsbu:5542: yat punaḥ pramuditādibhūmir niṣpannā pūrvamuktā tatra niṣpattir yathāvyavasthāpitabhūmimanasikāreṇa /
T06asmahsbu:5543: tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanāmātrajñānāt tad avikalpanā ca ca veditavyā /
T06asmahsbu:5545: tad pai ca kalpanāmātraṃ na vikalpayaty evaṃ grāhyagrāhakāvikalpajñānalābhād bhūmipariniṣpattir uktā bhavati /
T06asmahsbu:5546: api ca khalu bhūmīnāṃ bhāvanā ca niṣpattiś cobhayam acintyaṃ sarvabhūmiṣu /
T06asmahsbu:5547: tathā hi tad bodhisatvānāṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ buddhānāṃ ca viṣayo nānyeṣāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5549: adhimuktir hi sarvatra sālokā liṅgam iṣyate /
T06asmahsbu:5553: etadbhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisatvasya daśavidhaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5554: yāṃ bhūmiṃ praviṣṭas tatra sāloko yāṃ na praviṣṭas tatrādhimuktir ity etad ekaṃ liṅgaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5558: sarvabhūmiprativedhaś ca tad abhinirhārakauśalyataḥ sarvasatveṣv ātmasamacittatā /
T06asmahsbu:5562: buddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu copapattiḥ sarvakālam ity etāni aparāṇi liṅgāni bodhisatvasya /
T06asmahsbu:5564: nācchando na ca lubdhahrasvahṛdayo na krodhano nālaso nāmaitrīkarūṇāśayo na kumatiḥ kalpair vikalpair hataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5565: no vikṣiptamatiḥ sukhair na ca hato duḥkhair na vā vyāvartate satyaṃ mitram upāśritaḥ śrutaparaḥ pūjāparaḥ śāstari // AMsa_20-21.29 //
T06asmahsbu:5566: sarvaṃ puṇyasamuccayaṃ suvipulaṃ kṛtvānyasādhāraṇaṃ saṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty aharaharyo hy uttamopāyavit /
T06asmahsbu:5568: jātaḥ svāyatane sadā śubhakaraḥ krīḍaty abhijñāguṇaiḥ sarveṣām uparisthito guṇanidhir jñeyaḥ sa buddhātmanaḥ // AMsa_20-21.30 //
T06asmahsbu:5588: dhīmatām anuśaṃso hi sarvathā sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.31 //
T06asmahsbu:5595: dharmakāyaparipūripariniṣpattaye ca uttarād uttarataraṃ hetusaṃparigrahaṃ karoti /
T06asmahsbu:5600: paśyatāṃ bodhim āsannāṃ satvārthasya ca sādhanaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5601: tīvra utpadyate modo muditā tena kathyate // AMsa_20-21.32 //
T06asmahsbu:5605: dauḥśīlyam alasyānyayānamanasikāram alasya cātikramād vimalety ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:5606: tasmāt tarhy asmābhis tulyābhinirhāre sarvākārapariśodhanābhinirhāra eva yogaḥ karaṇīya iti vacanāt /
T06asmahsbu:5608: tathā hi tasyāṃ samādhibalenāpramāṇadharmaparyeṣaṇadhāraṇāt mahāntaṃ dharmāvabhāsaṃ pareṣāṃ karoti /
T06asmahsbu:5610: arciṣmatīti tadyogāt sā bhūmir dvayadāhataḥ // AMsa_20-21.34 //
T06asmahsbu:5611: sā bodhipakṣātmikā prjñā dvayadahanapratyupasthānā tasyāṃ bāhulyena /
T06asmahsbu:5612: dvayaṃ punaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ cātra veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5613: satvānāṃ paripākaś ca svacittasya ca rakṣaṇā /
T06asmahsbu:5614: dhīmadbhir jīyate duḥkhaṃ durjayā tena kathyate // AMsa_20-21.35 //
T06asmahsbu:5618: uktā hy abhimukhī bhūmiḥ prajñāpāramitāśrayāt // AMsa_20-21.36 //
T06asmahsbu:5619: sā hi prajñāpāramitāśrayeṇa nirvāṇasaṃsārayor apratiṣṭhānāt saṃsāranirvāṇayor abhimukhī
T06asmahsbu:5621: ekāyanapathaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭas tadupaśleṣatvāt dūraṃ gatā bhavati prayogapayantagamanāt /
T06asmahsbu:5623: dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyāṃ avicalanāt nimittasaṃjñayā animittābhogasaṃjñayā ca /
T06asmahsbu:5628: dvayavyāpter ity samādhimukhadhāraṇīmukhavyāpanān meghenevākāśasthālīyasyāśrayasaṃniviṣṭasya śrutadharmasya dharmameghety ucyate /
T06asmahsbu:5631: vividhakuśalābhinirhāranimittaṃ sadā sarvatra ratyā viharaṇād bodhisatvānāṃ bhūmayo vihārā ity ucyante /
T06asmahsbu:5633: bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eveṣṭā hi bhūmayaḥ // AMsa_20-21.40 //
T06asmahsbu:5634: bhūyo bhūyo 'mitāsv āsu ūrdhvaṃgamanayogād bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eva vihārāḥ punar bhūmaya ucyante /
T06asmahsbu:5640: prativedhāc ca bhūmīnāṃ niṣpatteś ca caturvidhaḥ // AMsa_20-21.41 //
T06asmahsbu:5643: caritalābho daśasu dharmacariteṣu ca vartanāt tasyām eva /
T06asmahsbu:5654: (Msa 184) paripācanaṃ hy atra vinayanaṃ ca deśitāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5667: jñānena jñeyaṃ vyāptaṃ te muktacitta namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.44 //
T06asmahsbu:5675: atrāvaraṇāśeṣaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvasatvakleśavinayanād utpāditakleśeṣv api ca tatkleśapratipakṣavighānāt kliṣṭajanānukampayā saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:5676: anye hy araṇāvihāriṇaḥ satvānāṃ kasyacid eva tadālambanasya kleśasyotpattipratyayamātraṃ pratiharanti /
T06asmahsbu:5680: sadaiva sarvapraśnānāṃ visarjaka namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.46 //
T06asmahsbu:5681: atra pañcabhir ākārair praṇidhijñānaviśeṣaṃ bhagavataḥ saṃdarśayati /
T06asmahsbu:5693: āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
T06asmahsbu:5694: avyāhatamate nityaṃ sudeśika namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.47 //
T06asmahsbu:5695: atra samāsato yac ca deśyate yena deśyate tatra nityam avyāhatamatitvenabhagavataś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido deśitāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5696: tatra dvayaṃ deśyate āśrayaś ca dharmaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5701: upetya vacanais teṣāṃ carijña āgatau gatau /
T06asmahsbu:5702: niḥsāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.48 //
T06asmahsbu:5703: atra ṣaḍbhir abhijñābhiḥ samyagavavādatvaṃ bhagavato darśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5705: teṣāṃ bhāṣayā divyaśrotrābhijñayā cittacaritraṃ jñātvā cetaḥparyāyābhijñayā yathā pūrvāntād ihāgatir yathā ca saṃsārān niḥsāraṇaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5709: dṛṣṭamātrāt prasādasya vidhāyaka namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.49 //
T06asmahsbu:5710: atra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ bhagavati mahāpuruṣatvasaṃpratyayena darśanamātrāt prasādajanakatvaṃ karma saṃdarśayitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5714: atra bhagavataś caturvidhayā vaśitayā sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ paridīpitāḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5721: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.51 //
T06asmahsbu:5722: atra caturṣv artheṣu satvānāṃ vipravādanaya māro yas tadbhañjakatvena bhagavato daśānāṃ balānāṃ karma saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5727: sthānāsthānajñānabalena hi bhagavān prathame 'rthe mārabhañjako veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5737: nirādhṛṣyatvād anyatīrthyair bhagavato yathākramaṃ caturvidhaṃ vaiśāradyam udbhāvitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5740: nirārakṣa asaṃmoṣa gaṇakarṣa namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.53 //
T06asmahsbu:5741: anena trīṇy arakṣāṇi trīṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhagavataḥ paridīpitāni /
T06asmahsbu:5743: tair hi yathākramaṃ vigṛhyavaktā ca bhavati parṣatsu nirārakṣatvāt /
T06asmahsbu:5748: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.54 //
T06asmahsbu:5749: anena cāre vihāre vā sarvatra sarvadā vāsarvajñaceṣṭitasyābhāvāt bhagavataḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5751: asarvajño hi kṣīṇakleśo 'py asamudghātitatvād vāsanāyā ekadā bhrāntena hastinā sārdhaṃ samāgacchati bhrāntena rathenety evamādikam asarvajñaceṣṭitaṃ karoti /
T06asmahsbu:5756: abandhyakṛtya satatam asaṃmoṣaḥ namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.55 //
T06asmahsbu:5757: anena yasya satvasya yo 'rthaḥ karaṇīyo yasmin kāle tatkālānativartanāt /
T06asmahsbu:5758: abandhyaṃ kṛtyaṃ sadā bhagavata ity asaṃmoṣadharmatvaṃ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5761: mahākaruṇayā yukta hitāśaya namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.56 //
T06asmahsbu:5762: atra mahākaruṇā bhagavataḥ karmataḥ svabhāvataś ca paridīpitā /
T06asmahsbu:5763: mahākaruṇayā hi bhagavān ṣaḍkṛtvo rātrindivena lokaṃ pratyavekṣate ko hīyate ko vardhate ity evamādi /
T06asmahsbu:5764: tadyogāc ca bhagavataḥ sarvasatveṣu nityaṃ hitāśayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5768: atra cārasasṃ gṛhītaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5772: tadanyasatvottamānām api śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām antikād uttamatvena sarvasatvottamatvaṃ paridīpitaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5778: nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣeti cārasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍāveṇikā buddhadharmā ye buddhasyaiva saṃvidyante nānyeṣāṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5779: nāsti chandaparihāṇir nāsti vīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāvimuktiparihāṇir ity adhigamasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍ /
T06asmahsbu:5781: anāgate pratyutpanne adhvani tathāgatasyāsaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānam iti /
T06asmahsbu:5785: sarvaṃ vākkarma sarvaṃ manaskarmeti karmasaṃgṛhāitās trayaḥ /
T06asmahsbu:5788: sarvatra sarvasatvānāṃ kāṅkṣāchida namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.58 //
T06asmahsbu:5789: anena tribhiś ca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānāc ca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā /
T06asmahsbu:5790: trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogiko nairmāṇikaś ca /
T06asmahsbu:5791: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punar atra sarvasatvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ /
T06asmahsbu:5794: āniṅkṣya sarvadharmeṣu niṣprapañca namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.59 //
T06asmahsbu:5805: akṣayair asamair yukto guṇair lokeṣu dṛśyase /
T06asmahsbu:5806: maṇḍaleṣv apy adṛśyaś ca sarvathā devamānuṣaiḥ // AMsa_20-21.61 //
T06asmahsbu:5814: sarvathā cādṛśyamānatā dharmakāyeneti trividhā prabhedavṛttir iti /
